quote: Profit or perish... There are only two ways to make money: increase sales and decrease costs.
author: Fred DeLuca

quote: Pretty much, Apple and Dell are the only ones in this industry making money. They make it by being Wal-Mart. We make it by innovation.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Yes, money is important. But it's all about the creative process.
author: Travis Scott

quote: You pay more in wages, get more in in tax, you get people living a higher standard, you get more money. It's a kind of circle.
author: Jeremy Corbyn

quote: When we talk about having a life of significance and meaning, it's not about fame or money or resources. It's about people and lives and hearts. That's my biggest passion in life.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: The money's the same, whether you earn it or scam it.
author: Bobby Heenan

quote: We learned many years ago that the rich may have money, but the poor have time.
author: Cesar Chavez

quote: I would never wear a look that was all the same designer. I always wear at least one thing that is vintage. I dress according to my mood, and I usually spend money on the basics, like leather jackets, handbags, sweaters and shoes.
author: Elsa Hosk

quote: People spend time worrying about things they think they have to have and lose perception of what they do have. You can have all the money and material things you want. If you aren't here to enjoy them, what good do they do?
author: Eric Davis

quote: Most of Hollywood is about making money - and I love money, but I don't make the films thinking about money.
author: David Lynch

quote: In school, my favorite subject was math. That's where I learned to count money.
author: French Montana

quote: Cricketers have a very short shelf life. On an average, you make money through cricket for five years, but you need to survive for sixty years.
author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

quote: If our soldiers are not overburdened with money, it is not because they have a distaste for riches; if their lives are not unduly long, it is not because they are disinclined to longevity.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Why are people unemployed? Because there is no work. Why is there no work? Because people are not buying products and services. Why are people not buying products and services? Because they have no money. Why do people have no money? Because they are unemployed.
author: Craig Bruce

quote: I definitely wanted to earn my freedom. But the primary motivation wasn't making money, but making an impact.
author: Sean Parker

quote: Money is just the poor man's credit card.
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: So you think that money is the root of all evil. Have you ever asked what is the root of all money?
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Neither a borrower nor a lender be.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The safe way to double your money is to fold it over once and put it in your pocket.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Pennies do not come from heaven. They have to be earned here on earth.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: The man who won't loan money isn't going to have many friends - or need them.
author: Wilt Chamberlain

quote: Run for your life from any man who tells you that money is evil. That sentence is the leper's bell of an approaching looter.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: We have the right as individuals to give away as much of our own money as we please in charity but as members of Congress we have no right to appropriate a dollar of the public money.
author: Davy Crockett

quote: Criminals are never very amusing. It's because they're failures. Those who make real money aren't counted as criminals. This is a class distinction, not an ethical problem.
author: Orson Welles

quote: My pride fell with my fortunes.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Friends and acquaintances are the surest passport to fortune.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive.
author: Henry Miller

quote: I'm hopeless with money I simply spend what I've got.
author: Freddie Mercury

quote: I had some money, I made the best paintings ever. I was completely reclusive, worked a lot, took a lot of drugs. I was awful to people.
author: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quote: We've got to put a lot of money into changing behavior.
author: Bill Gates

quote: It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong, but the love of money for its own sake.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Money does not make you happy but it quiets the nerves.
author: Sean O'Casey

quote: A man is usually more careful of his money than of his principles.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: But men are so full of greed today, they'll sell anything for a little piece of money.
author: Little Richard

quote: Fame is addictive. Money is addictive. Attention is addictive. But golf is second to none.
author: Marc Anthony

quote: The people who are buying stocks because they're going up and they don't know what they do deserve to lose money.
author: Jim Cramer

quote: Because its hard to realize now that that was the end of the great depression, you know. All of a sudden all of this is in front of me and I'm solvent, you know. I'm making some money and I know where my next meal is coming from, and I have a new pair of shoes and that's it.
author: Robert McCloskey

quote: My NFL pension can barely pay my son's tuition. You know, it's very little money.
author: O. J. Simpson

quote: I did my time for the rape. I paid my money to Las Vegas. I paid my dues.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: While money doesn't buy love, it puts you in a great bargaining position.
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: There's something so romantic about being broke in New York. You gotta do it. You have to live there once without any money, and then you have to live there when you have money. Let me tell you, of the two, the latter is far better.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: I spent more money on one robe than guys spend in five years.
author: Ric Flair

quote: Money is worth nothing if it can't buy you the opportunity to love more.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: On privacy issues, it's just like hundreds of years ago when people said, 'I would rather put my money under my pillow than in a bank.' But today, banks know how to protect money much better than you do. Today, we may not have the answers to privacy issues, but I believe our young people will come up with the solutions.
author: Jack Ma

quote: Money is the string with which a sardonic destiny directs the motions of its puppets.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: We all need money, but there are degrees of desperation.
author: Anthony Burgess

quote: There are necessary evils. Money is an important thing in terms of representing freedom in our world. And now I have a daughter to think about. It's really the first time I've thought about the future and what it could be.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: Charter schools are public schools that operate, to a certain extent, outside the system. They have more control over their teachers, curriculum and resources. They also have less money than public schools.
author: Maggie Gallagher

quote: Money takes wings. The only thing that endures is character.
author: O. J. Simpson

quote: But if you want to continue to be slaves of the banks and pay the cost of your own slavery, then let bankers continue to create money and control credit.
author: Josiah Stamp

quote: Money can't buy poverty.
author: Marty Feldman

quote: It will be a great day when our schools have all the money they need, and our air force has to have a bake-sale to buy a bomber.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: A savvy entrepreneur will not always look for investment money, first.
author: Daymond John

quote: People may take a job for more money, but they often leave it for more recognition.
author: Bob Nelson

quote: When men have money and power they get turned on, sexually. They get horny as hell. Can't imagine why, though.
author: Penelope Spheeris

quote: And I think the more money you put in people's hands, the more they will spend. And if they don't spend it, they invest it. And investing it is another way of creating jobs. It puts money into mutual funds or other kinds of banks that can go out and make loans, and we need to do that.
author: Michael Bloomberg

quote: If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free; if our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: A man who gives his children habits of industry provides for them better than by giving them fortune.
author: Richard Whately

quote: We are not going to achieve a new world order without paying for it in blood as well as in words and money.
author: Arthur M. Schlesinger, Jr.

quote: If you can get some of the devil's money to use for the Lord's work, if you have to borrow it, it is all right and carry on the work.
author: John Harvey Kellogg

quote: I know why most people never get rich. They put the money ahead of the job. If you just think of the job, the money will automatically follow. This never fails.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: Bank failures are caused by depositors who don't deposit enough money to cover losses due to mismanagement.
author: Dan Quayle

quote: Always try to rub up against money, for if you rub up against money long enough, some of it may rub off on you.
author: Damon Runyon

quote: All the money I have, I got it legally.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: I have a fantastic relationship with money. I use it to buy my freedom.
author: Gianni Versace

quote: When my father bid $5,000 for the 1962 Championship Game, that was a huge amount. It was double the bid the year before. Pete Rozelle was flabbergasted. Who was this guy who was willing to spend so much money on what seemed like relatively worthless rights to the NFL Championship Game?
author: Steve Sabol

quote: I always look at money not as a motivating factor but as an element in the composition. You can't ignore it, but you've got to be very careful that it's not motivating you.
author: Damien Hirst

quote: It's easy to love yourself when you feel good enough, when you feel special enough, when you're loved enough, when you have enough money, and you're appreciated.
author: Debbie Ford

quote: Most people are squeamish about saying how much they earn, but in medicine the situation seems especially fraught. Doctors aren't supposed to be in it for the money, and the more concerned a doctor seems to be about making money the more suspicious people become about the care being provided.
author: Atul Gawande

quote: The purpose of work is not to make money. The purpose of work is to make the workers, whether working stiffs or top executives, feel good about life.
author: Ricardo Semler

quote: I don't buy these rag magazines that feed off of stolen, you know, press. They're basically stealing someone's image in order to make money for themselves... They wait at the end of my street in their cars. Every time I exit my home, I have company.
author: Ashton Kutcher

quote: I don't think there is anything wrong in earning money from the sport you love. If you work hard and get benefits from it, there is no harm. The day you feel that you are not working hard and are only looking at the benefits, that's where the problem is.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: Not only do unemployment benefits help families who are hurting they also put money into their pockets that they'll then spend - and their spending will keep other Americans in jobs.
author: Robert Reich

quote: There is nothing wrong with making money, but that's not particularly inspiring.
author: John Mackey

quote: One should live between extravagance and meanness. Don't save money by starving your mind. It is false economy never to take a holiday, or never to spend money for an evening's amusement or for a useful book.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: I'm enjoying life at my fullest. Sometimes you realize that money isn't everything.
author: Rey Mysterio

quote: Money is like manure, of very little use except it be spread.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: It isn't enough for you to love money - it's also necessary that money should love you.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: The process by which banks create money is so simple that the mind is repelled.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: I could have played another year, but I would have been playing for the money, and baseball deserves better than that.
author: George Brett

quote: I don't think the money people in Hollywood have ever thought I was normal, but I am dedicated to my work and that's what counts.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: Three groups spend other people's money: children, thieves, politicians. All three need supervision.
author: Dick Armey

quote: Money is the seed of money, and the first guinea is sometimes more difficult to acquire than the second million.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Money is neither my god nor my devil. It is a form of energy that tends to make us more of who we already are, whether it's greedy or loving.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Money is in some respects life's fire: it is a very excellent servant, but a terrible master.
author: P. T. Barnum

quote: Look, you're here to see me, and I can't go on until my dealer is here, and he's waiting to be paid, so give me some money so I can fix up, and then you'll get your show.
author: Iggy Pop

quote: Don't give me any money, don't give me any people, but give freedom, and I'll give you a movie that looks gigantic.
author: Robert Rodriguez

quote: Money tends to make people suspicious, if there's any money floating around.
author: Mitchell Baker

quote: We have one of the highest interest rates in the world, and we owe more money per capita than any other country. All we need is a nail hole in the bottom of the boat and we're sunk.
author: Pauline Hanson

quote: Because A Walk To Remember had come out and it had made money and I got a lot of congratulations at that time as it happens out there.
author: Shane West

quote: I think the situation in Toronto is such that there are funding organizations which make it easy for a film to raise more money than it needs and very often that works against a film.
author: Atom Egoyan

quote: Our American friends offer us money, arms, and advice. We take the money, we take the arms, and we decline the advice.
author: Moshe Dayan

quote: What have I got? No looks, no money, no education. Just talent.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: More than one-third of Mexicans in the United States own property in Mexico, nearly 80 percent send money home and 25 percent have a spouse in Mexico. Assimilation and becoming an American citizen are not the objective for many of them.
author: John Shadegg

quote: That is where the power, opportunity, and choice come from-when you have money. Money equals opportunity. There is no question.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Love is cheap. You can buy it anywhere. Lives are cheap. It's money that's dear. You have to work days and sit up nights thinking how to make money.
author: John Dos Passos

quote: The extravagant expenditure of public money is an evil not to be measured by the value of that money to the people who are taxed for it.
author: Chester A. Arthur

quote: I've never chased money. It's always been about what I can do to motivate and inspire people.
author: Tyler Perry

quote: Other than my foundation - mentoring programs - everything I do is for money.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: When you're making an independent film what you don't have in time and money you have to make up with creativity and diligence.
author: Matthew Lillard

quote: I felt in a lot of instances I was deliberately being put through stress because when you're a guy who generates money, people have a vested interested in controlling you.
author: Dave Chappelle

quote: The 'American Idol' and 'X Factor' shows, they're great shows. But I think I need to make a show like that, directed straight to the hood, to the artists that don't get the attention, that don't have the money to make themselves representable.
author: Snoop Dogg

quote: I'm free of stress and worries now because if I don't like something I'm doing, I just find the fun in it instead of being miserable. Let me have fun with the people I work with, let me have fun making money - when I grew up so poor, ya know?
author: Jenny McCarthy

quote: Now workers should have the right to join unions. But unions should not be forced upon workers. And unions should not have the power to take money our of their members' paychecks to buy the support of politicians that are favored by the union bosses.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: If you got the money honey I got the time and when you run out of money honey I run out of time.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: My luck at the gambling table was varied; sometimes I was fifty to a hundred dollars ahead, and at other times I had to borrow money from my fellow workmen to settle my room rent and pay for my meals.
author: James Weldon Johnson

quote: I have too much money invested in sweaters.
author: Bob Hope

quote: I made more money yesterday than I ever thought I'd make in an entire lifetime. But it's like somebody's going to take it all away from me and I'll be back in Texas, installing them damned irrigation wells. I didn't like that when I was sixteen. And I know I wouldn't like it when I'm eighty.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: What we need is more money back in the hands of Americans of any economic standing and so raising taxes right now doesn't make sense.
author: Kevin Yoder

quote: There was a time when a fool and his money were soon parted, but now it happens to everybody.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: You want 21 percent risk free? Pay off your credit cards.
author: Andrew Tobias

quote: Money is the barometer of a society's virtue.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: You have to go broke three times to learn how to make a living.
author: Casey Stengel

quote: Credit buying is much like being drunk. The buzz happens immediately and gives you a lift... The hangover comes the day after.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: The thing that differentiates man from animals is money.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: Money's a horrid thing to follow, but a charming thing to meet.
author: Henry James

quote: If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: No man's credit is as good as his money.
author: John Dewey

quote: Money will buy a pretty good dog, but it won't buy the wag of his tail.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Affluence creates poverty.
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: It's morally wrong to allow a sucker to keep his money.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: For I can raise no money by vile means.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Wealth and want equally harden the human heart.
author: Theodore Parker

quote: There's just one thing I can't figure out. My income tax!
author: Nat King Cole

quote: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some.
author: Joe Moore

quote: I am happy to make money. I want to make more money, make more music, eat Big Macs and drink Budweisers.
author: Kid Rock

quote: Anybody who thinks money will make you happy, hasn't got money.
author: David Geffen

quote: Money equals freedom.
author: Kevin O'Leary

quote: The big difference between sex for money and sex for free is that sex for money usually costs a lot less.
author: Brendan Behan

quote: There's no money in poetry, but then there's no poetry in money, either.
author: Robert Graves

quote: Banks are an almost irresistible attraction for that element of our society which seeks unearned money.
author: J. Edgar Hoover

quote: A man is usually more careful of his money than he is of his principles.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If advertisers spent the same amount of money on improving their products as they do on advertising then they wouldn't have to advertise them.
author: Will Rogers

quote: You can't pay enough money to... cure that feeling of being broken and confused.
author: Winona Ryder

quote: Neither soldiers nor money can defend a king but only friends won by good deeds, merit, and honesty.
author: Sallust

quote: If a man has money, it is usually a sign, too, that he knows how to take care of it; don't imagine his money is easy to get simply because he has plenty of it.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: You can have money piled to the ceiling but the size of your funeral is still going to depend on the weather.
author: Chuck Tanner

quote: I pity the French Cinema because it has no money. I pity the American Cinema because it has no ideas.
author: Jean-Luc Godard

quote: God is on everyone's side... and in the last analysis, he is on the side with plenty of money and large armies.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: Nobody ever lost money taking a profit.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: Gambling with cards or dice or stocks is all one thing. It's getting money without giving an equivalent for it.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: We can safely abandon the doctrine of the eighties, namely that the rich were not working because they had too little money, the poor because they had much.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: There's only one thing money won't buy, and that is poverty.
author: Joe E. Lewis

quote: I really don't like talking about money. All I can say is that the Good Lord must have wanted me to have it.
author: Larry Bird

quote: The price we have to pay for money is sometimes liberty.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Time will take your money, but money won't buy time.
author: James Taylor

quote: Money is not required to buy one necessity of the soul.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Get inside information from the president and you will probably lose half your money. If you get it from the chairman of the board, you will lose all of your money.
author: Jim Rogers

quote: I heard someone in opposition to reform last night criticize the president for saying it's their money. They said it's not their money it's my mother's money. Well that's what's wrong with the system.
author: Johnny Isakson

quote: I didn't think any amount of money was worth something that would take away what you believed in or what you stood for. I didn't want to do something my parents and daughter couldn't be proud of.
author: Tippi Hedren

quote: My ambition is to have beautiful encounters, not to make money.
author: Juliette Binoche

quote: I'd rather have happiness than money. People ask for it. Sometimes when I don't have it. I make other people's problems my problem because they want me to they ask me to.
author: Brenda Fassie

quote: I choose the likely man in preference to the rich man I want a man without money rather than money without a man.
author: Themistocles

quote: Money is only a vehicle that provides you with options, and I say there's only one thing that money can't buy - poverty.
author: Jerry Doyle

quote: What we get from this adventure is just sheer joy. And joy is, after all, the end of life. We do not live to eat and make money.
author: George Leigh Mallory

quote: There's no way in the world I can feel the same blues the way I used to. When I play in Chicago, I'm playing up-to-date, not the blues I was born with. People should hear the pure blues - the blues we used to have when we had no money.
author: Muddy Waters

quote: No race of barbarians ever existed yet offered up children for money.
author: Samuel Gompers

quote: I always ignore money.
author: Damien Hirst

quote: The reason there weren't any, I am surmising, is that a lot of Latin kids, Latino kids, in those days didn't have the money to take those kind of classes.
author: Rita Moreno

quote: I did a terrible television pilot that was so badly written and dumb that it became a turning point for me and I decided that I would never accept a job just because I needed the money.
author: Fran Drescher

quote: As a society we're always so quick and able to spend money on lawyers for someone for incarceration, but we don't make the corresponding commitment to the preventative components of it.
author: Matt Gonzalez

quote: We are now after 7 months operation making money here.
author: Henry Wells

quote: Now Congress learns that the Veterans Administration failed to provide complete, accurate information on the money it needs for both this year and next year.
author: Doc Hastings

quote: San Francisco is an interesting place. It's always been such a nice culturally diverse environment, which it still is, but there's a lot of money there now and a lot of dot com's so it's a little different than it used to be.
author: Les Claypool

quote: Money can add very much to one's ability to lead a constructive life, not only pleasant for oneself, but, hopefully, beneficial to others.
author: David Rockefeller

quote: When I was younger I was completely without money - when I was studying in Budapest, when I was a refugee.
author: Gyorgy Ligeti

quote: I really wish there was some big brother conspiracy theory. I just think it's the ignorance of trying to make a dollar. That's what the networks have done and will continue to do. If anyone doesn't think that this is about making money, then they're crazy.
author: Montel Williams

quote: American men, as a group, seem to be interested in only two things, money and breasts. It seems a very narrow outlook.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: The black groups that boycott certain films would do better to get the money together to make the films they want to see, or stay in church and leave us to our work.
author: Richard Pryor

quote: And, we have no such thing as a budget anymore. Our manager freaks when we show him the bill. We're lavish to the bone, but all our money goes back into the product.
author: Freddie Mercury

quote: Law students have taken over Hollywood. To them it's all about making money. They know people want to see what they've seen before. Also, remakes are places to showcase the new stars of tomorrow.
author: Tobe Hooper

quote: Fame was thrilling only until it became grueling. Money was fun only until you ran out of things to buy.
author: Gloria Swanson

quote: We are the nation the most powerful, the most armed and we are supplying arms and money to the rest of the world where we are not ourselves fighting. We are eating while there is famine in the world.
author: Dorothy Day

quote: Money is the great tool through whose means labor and skill become universally co-operative.
author: Leland Stanford

quote: We got more provisions for our whiskey than the same money, which we paid for the liquor, would have bought; so after all it proved a very profitable investment.
author: Buffalo Bill

quote: I had a great time on News Radio, I got to make tons of money in relative obscurity and learn a lot about the TV biz and work on my standup act constantly. It was a dream gig.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: The way I grew up, I was always taught that it's uncouth to talk about money, and that's not what should inspire you.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: No matter how much money you have or what kind of cocoon you live in, the reality is that you have lost a game of football and let England's fans down. We are bothered.
author: Rio Ferdinand

quote: A little wanton money, which burned out the bottom of his purse.
author: Thomas More

quote: We talk about a free press. These people hide, they make a lot of money off the media. They hide behind the slogans of free press, and then they can come out with crap like that. It's just garbage. It's insulting to the readers.
author: Robert Scheer

quote: I have heartaches, I have blues. No matter what you got, the blues is there. 'Cause that's all I know - the blues. And I can sing the blues so deep until you can have this room full of money and I can give you the blues.
author: John Lee Hooker

quote: Happy is harder than money. Anybody who thinks money will make you happy hasn't got money.
author: David Geffen

quote: Because parents have power over children. They feel they have to do what their parents say. But the love of money is the root of all evil. And this is a sweet child. And to see him turn like this, this isn't him. This is not him.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: And my father didn't have money for me to go to college. And at that particular time they didn't have black quarterbacks, and I don't think I could have made it in basketball, because I was only 5' 11". So I just picked baseball.
author: Willie Mays

quote: I like to sing ballads the way Eddie Fisher does and the way Perry Como does. But the way I'm singing now is what makes the money.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: The rich man who gives, steals twice over. First he steals the money and then the hearts of men.
author: Edvard Munch

quote: Money may kindle, but it cannot by itself, and for very long, burn.
author: Igor Stravinsky

quote: I make a lot of money and I'm worth every cent.
author: Naomi Campbell

quote: I like my money right where I can see it... hanging in my closet.
author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quote: There's so little money in my bank account, my scenic checks show a ghetto.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Always remember, money isn't everything - but also remember to make a lot of it before talking such fool nonsense.
author: Earl Wilson

quote: But if inventions have increased man's power over nature very much, then the real value of money is better measured for some purposes in labour than in commodities.
author: Alfred Marshall

quote: Having money is rather like being a blond. It is more fun but not vital.
author: Mary Quant

quote: A fool and his money are lucky enough to get together in the first place.
author: Stanley Weiser

quote: Because people have no thoughts to deal in, they deal cards, and try and win one another's money. Idiots!
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: When you're on a series, it's tough to go on and do something else afterward. If you're smart, save your money and you can wait out the bad times, until something else comes along.
author: Michael Dorn

quote: It is time for us to insist that we are accountable for the money that we are spending.
author: Eric Cantor

quote: You know, my main reaction to this money thing is that it's humorous, all the attention to it, because it's hardly the most insightful or valuable thing that's happened to me.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Money is a scoreboard where you can rank how you're doing against other people.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: I never imagined being able to make money from acting - and now I can.
author: Anna Faris

quote: There's something about the good-hearted guy fighting the system. I just love that. That's how 'Speed' is. He's a really focused guy with a heart of gold and the corporations are trying to crush him and use him for his skills to make them more money.
author: Emile Hirsch

quote: I think I'm pretty smart on what I spend my money on. I still don't have a new car, I drive my old car that I've had forever. But I bought a house in downtown Chicago.
author: Chris O'Donnell

quote: My first job was in sixth grade, sweeping the clay tennis courts at the yacht club near my house, which I was not a member of. Always had to pay my own rent. But I don't really have any concept of how money works. I don't know how much things cost. Like a BMW. Or a quart of milk. It's embarrassing.
author: Chloe Sevigny

quote: Only the elites despise earning money.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: In Sweden, I went to an English school, where there was a mishmash of people from all over the world. Some were diplomatic kids with a lot of money, some were ghetto kids who came up from the suburbs, and I grew up in between. There's a community of second generation immigrants, and I became part of that because I had an American father.
author: Joel Kinnaman

quote: Like anything else that happens on its own, the act of writing is beyond currency. Money is great stuff to have, but when it comes to the act of creation, the best thing is not to think of money too much. It constipates the whole process.
author: Stephen King

quote: In all honesty, I grew up a certain way. I never had to worry about money... that was my reality.
author: Tori Spelling

quote: A lot of people, most people who are working, they do it for money. And I'm not saying there's anything wrong with that. It so happens that I made a lot of money already, so I don't have to worry that much about it. I wouldn't fault anybody for doing it for the money, but it doesn't interest me right now.
author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quote: When you have less revenue coming in the door, you have more money going out the door. You have to find ways of trimming.
author: Mike Lee

quote: Most of the people around me have a vested interest in how much money I make. You know, so a celebrity could find themselves in a position where people could have meetings about their life without them involved. And when I say 'their life' I mean not their professional life either. They could talk about their personal life.
author: Dave Chappelle

quote: I've never made a movie to make money. I've never made a painting to make money.
author: Julian Schnabel

quote: In liberal logic, if life is unfair then the answer is to turn more tax money over to politicians, to spend in ways that will increase their chances of getting reelected.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: The great thing about American women is their energy and the way they love to dress. French women don't really dress; they are too conservative, as it's always a question of money. In America, women are powerful and strong, determined. If they want to be an object, they choose to be in control.
author: Jean Paul Gaultier

quote: If I'm paying money to come to see you, you shouldn't look like everybody else in the crowd.
author: Randy Jackson

quote: Money is the most corrosive aspect of life today because it means that all attention to detail is forgotten.
author: Roberto Cavalli

quote: In England everyone puts a lot of pressure on you when you have cost a lot of money.
author: Andriy Shevchenko

quote: Remember that credit is money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Well private money can take risks in a way that government money often isn't willing to.
author: Bill Gates

quote: I went to the bank and asked to borrow a cup of money. They said, 'What for?' I said, 'I'm going to buy some sugar.'
author: Steven Wright

quote: Very few people can afford to be poor.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: When a man says money can do anything, that settles it: he hasn't got any.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: There are few ways in which a man can be more innocently employed than in getting money.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: No man but a blockhead ever wrote except for money.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Money and time are the heaviest burdens of life, and... the unhappiest of all mortals are those who have more of either than they know how to use.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: We go to school to learn to work hard for money. I write books and create products that teach people how to have money work hard for them.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: It is more rewarding to watch money change the world than watch it accumulate.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Money: power at its most liquid.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Let advertisers spend the same amount of money improving their product that they do on advertising and they wouldn't have to advertise it.
author: Will Rogers

quote: If I have enough money to eat I'm good.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: Many people are in the dark when it comes to money, and I'm going to turn on the lights.
author: Suze Orman

quote: The foundation of a financial fresh start actually has nothing to do with money or specific financial dos and don'ts.
author: Suze Orman

quote: URGE is a grassroots charity. We organized to get some incubators to give to the hospital for the kids. We donate money to orphanages.
author: Ziggy Marley

quote: I wanted to make a living, but I really was not interested in money at all. I was interested in being a great comedian.
author: Larry David

quote: Nothing induces me to read a novel except when I have to make money by writing about it. I detest them.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: If we had 3 million exhibitionists and only one voyeur, nobody could make any money.
author: Albert Brooks

quote: As long as I can make lots of money in other businesses, I'll continue to subsidize my own work.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: I was never sloppy with other people's money. Only my own. Because I figure, well, you can be.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: Money is our madness, our vast collective madness.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Right now it's only a notion, but I think I can get the money to make it into a concept, and later turn it into an idea.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Money is always there but the pockets change; it is not in the same pockets after a change, and that is all there is to say about money.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: One thing that people keep on saying to me is that the wealth and the fame must have made up for missing out on my childhood. But the idea of money - putting a price on your childhood - is ridiculous. You will never get those years back and you can't put a price on them.
author: Tom Felton

quote: I know why they don't like me because they want the money I have.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: Simply by not owning three medium-sized castles in Tuscany I have saved enough money in the last forty years on insurance premiums alone to buy a medium-sized castle in Tuscany.
author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: All I wanted to do was write - at the time, poems, and prose, too. I guess my ambition was simply to make money however I could to keep myself going in some modest way, and I didn't need much, I was unmarried at the time, no children.
author: Paul Auster

quote: The money can be a hindrance to someone like me because the danger is that you start thinking, 'Is that a $20 million take?' That kind of thing, and being self-critical.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: As I have said for many years throughout this land, we're borrowing money from China to buy oil from the Persian Gulf to burn it in ways that destroy the future of human civilization. Every bit of that has to change.
author: Al Gore

quote: As a small child in England, I had this dream of going to Africa. We didn't have any money and I was a girl, so everyone except my mother laughed at it. When I left school, there was no money for me to go to university, so I went to secretarial college and got a job.
author: Jane Goodall

quote: If anyone tells you it's impossible to be fabulous and smart and make a ton of money using math, well, they can just get in line behind you - and kiss your math.
author: Danica McKellar

quote: It was an honor and privilege to arrive to this country 16 years ago with almost no money in my pocket. A lot has happened since then.
author: Antonio Banderas

quote: I enjoy my money, and I'm not ashamed to admit it. I'd certainly rather be rich than poor.
author: Christine McVie

quote: I'm not broke. Like everybody else, I owe money.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: Economy does not lie in sparing money, but in spending it wisely.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: Money is a poor man's credit card.
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: I've made all my money on my own without my family and I work very hard.
author: Paris Hilton

quote: I made a list of people who needed just a little bit of money. And when the list was complete, there were 42 names. The total amount of money they needed was $27. I was shocked.
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: Money differs from an automobile or mistress in being equally important to those who have it and those who do not.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Everyone knows we get paid a lot of money, so why pretend otherwise?
author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quote: Liking money like I like it, is nothing less than mysticism. Money is a glory.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: And plenty makes us poor.
author: John Dryden

quote: Research indicates that most women want their man to earn more than they do.
author: Laura Schlessinger

quote: I'd rather lose my own money than someone else's.
author: Dean Kamen

quote: Banks have a new image. Now you have 'a friend,' your friendly banker. If the banks are so friendly, how come they chain down the pens?
author: Alan King

quote: I got started in 1995, working in a group called The Cash Money Click.
author: Ja Rule

quote: It is a waste of money to help those who show no desire to help themselves.
author: Taylor Caldwell

quote: Low budgets force you to be more creative. Sometimes, with too much money, time and equipment, you can over-think. My way, you can use your gut instinct.
author: Robert Rodriguez

quote: Money is not real. It is a conscious agreement on measuring value.
author: John Ralston Saul

quote: Here in the big city people spend their time thinking about work and about money they don't give some value to friendships and it can be depressing.
author: Adriana Lima

quote: Wealth flows from energy and ideas.
author: William Feather

quote: I could have made money this way, and perhaps amused myself writing code. But I knew that at the end of my career, I would look back on years of building walls to divide people, and feel I had spent my life making the world a worse place.
author: Richard Stallman

quote: There is nothing so habit-forming as money.
author: Don Marquis

quote: Nothing is more dangerous to men than a sudden change of fortune.
author: Quintilian

quote: It's better to waste money than time. You can always get more money.
author: Hal Sparks

quote: Wealth should not be seized, but the god-given is much better.
author: Hesiod

quote: People don't have time to wait for somebody to paint their portraits anymore. The money is in photography.
author: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: It's our money, and we're free to spend it any way we please.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: I do not give money for just mere hopes.
author: Terence

quote: Musician jokes are a kind of joke that usually have to do with how much money someone makes. Musicians are always starving, so they're really mean to each other about who makes what.
author: Jackson Browne

quote: Money is everywhere but so is poetry. What we lack are the poets.
author: Federico Fellini

quote: If money was my only motivation, I would organize myself differently.
author: Placido Domingo

quote: I don't have any blindness when it comes to my money. As an actor, you can get distracted by your work. I do keep an eye on my nest egg, if you will.
author: Judd Nelson

quote: Money just draws flies.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: In fact, the confidence of the people is worth more than money.
author: Carter G. Woodson

quote: And what is needed to prevent them from joining gangs was ample recreation for boys as well as girls, jobs and internships for training and money, and assistance to allow their families to live in decent homes.
author: Bobby Scott

quote: Money changes all the iron rules into rubber bands.
author: Ryszard Kapuscinski

quote: It's easier to force feed people than it is to give 'em what they want. It makes more money.
author: Merle Haggard

quote: It's not always about the money.
author: Morris Chestnut

quote: As human beings, we're very materialistic and have all this stuff - furs and cars and diamonds and money.
author: Smokey Robinson

quote: Money is a mechanism for control.
author: David Korten

quote: An important lever for sustained action in tackling poverty and reducing hunger is money.
author: Gro Harlem Brundtland

quote: The most efficient labor-saving device is still money.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: The American people do not want ambassadorships or any other position handed out to save a party money.
author: Darrell Issa

quote: That is why the analogy of stealing does not work. With a thief, we want to know how much money he stole, and from whom. With the artist it is not how much he took and from whom, but what he did with it.
author: Lukas Foss

quote: Don't judge me. I made a lot of money.
author: Samantha Bee

quote: Isn't it a shame that future generations can't be here to see all the wonderful things we're doing with their money?
author: Earl Wilson

quote: I think even if I did the research mentioned above, it would be a total waste of money because if those people don't believe in the testimonials, they won't believe in the research at all. They would say that I made it all up. So why waste money?
author: Alex Chiu

quote: Many folks think they aren't good at earning money, when what they don't know is how to use it.
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: When someone came to ask us for help, it was sacred. We did not even think twice. We helped them, even if we had only meagre means; we offered them arms, a little bit of money, and in occasion, men.
author: Ahmed Ben Bella

quote: Mary-Kate and Ashley, who played Michelle, were great. I miss them, I love them, and I need to borrow some money from them.
author: John Stamos

quote: The money that we make from the company goes into The Body Shop Foundation, which isn't one of those awful tax shelters like some in America. It just functions to take the money and give it away.
author: Anita Roddick

quote: I am fiercely loyal to those willing to put their money where my mouth is.
author: Paul Harvey

quote: The substitute for knowledge is money.
author: Gordon Bethune

quote: I don't think business news is just for old white men with money.
author: Neil Cavuto

quote: All my money was made doing the dates and selling products when I was out there on the road.
author: Mickey Gilley

quote: I'm tired of love I'm still more tired of rhyme but money gives me pleasure all the time.
author: Hilaire Belloc

quote: Marrying into money was not a good thing for me.
author: Anna Nicole Smith

quote: You never know if they like you for who you are or what you are. Would he love me or the money?
author: Anna Nicole Smith

quote: I'll get to make a lot of money and do some bad sitcoms.
author: Darrell Hammond

quote: When you have a country that can boast that more than 95 percent of its eligible workforce is employed and pumping money back into economy, that's exceptionally good news, especially as we prepare to observe Labor Day.
author: J. D. Hayworth

quote: It would be nice if the poor were to get even half of the money that is spent in studying them.
author: Bill Vaughan

quote: I don't need a lot of money. Simplicity is the answer for me.
author: Linda McCartney

quote: False opinions are like false money, struck first of all by guilty men and thereafter circulated by honest people who perpetuate the crime without knowing what they are doing.
author: Joseph de Maistre

quote: I don't spend much money on clothes I never did.
author: Lauren Hutton

quote: Everyone needs a certain amount of money. Beyond that, we pursue money because we know how to obtain it. We don't necessarily know how to obtain happiness.
author: Gregg Easterbrook

quote: Sooner or later, we sell out for money.
author: Tony Randall

quote: I'm not financially insecure anymore either so I don't have to sit there and get on the latest Poison tour just to make money, which is what a lot of them are doing.
author: Kip Winger

quote: If I steal money from any person, there may be no harm done from the mere transfer of possession; he may not feel the loss, or it may prevent him from using the money badly. But I cannot help doing this great wrong towards Man, that I make myself dishonest.
author: William Kingdon Clifford

quote: We're basically after Joe's beer money, and Joe likes his beer, so you better make sure that what you give him is at least as pleasurable to him as having his six-pack of beer would be.
author: Jerry Pournelle

quote: Money speaks, but it speaks with a male voice.
author: Andrea Dworkin

quote: I think that focusing on the money, on the business, is not enough.
author: Sergei Bubka

quote: It doesn't matter about money; having it, not having it. Or having clothes, or not having them. You're still left alone with yourself in the end.
author: Billy Idol

quote: You can win, it'll just cost you some money.
author: Bobby Heenan

quote: If you make a living, if you earn your own money, you're free - however free one can be on this planet.
author: Theodore White

quote: Those people are unabashedly ruthless as far as money is concerned.
author: Giovanni Ribisi

quote: When you're in the States and you're a writer and you've got money and you walk into a bank, you're a bum with money.
author: Norman Spinrad

quote: The greatest luxury of riches is that they enable you to escape so much good advice.
author: Arthur Helps

quote: If God has allowed me to earn so much money, it is because He knows I give it all away.
author: Edith Piaf

quote: What counts is what you do with your money, not where it came from.
author: Merton Miller

quote: Another is, if you take money out of your left pocket and put it in your right pocket, you're no richer.
author: Merton Miller

quote: I'm an entertainer. If people are paying good money for tickets they deserve the best show they can see. I don't get into lighting stuff on fire, but I do believe in going the extra mile.
author: Bryan White

quote: Anybody can decide if they have got the money to fight a case if they don't like a particular thing, and they complain to the watch committee, local council or whatever.
author: Timothy West

quote: I lost money, coaching jobs, a shot at the Hall of Fame.
author: Curt Flood

quote: I, Joan Crawford, I believe in the dollar. Everything I earn, I spend.
author: Joan Crawford

quote: Hip-hop don't have no fresh energy, none at all. It's money driven, everybody tryin' to make that cheque, nobody putting art in their albums any more.
author: Andre Benjamin

quote: Civilized countries generally adopt gold or silver or both as money.
author: Alfred Marshall

quote: One of the strangest things about life is that the poor, who need the money the most, are the ones that never have it.
author: Finley Peter Dunne

quote: It's all about the money.
author: Joseph Jackson

quote: If American men are obsessed with money, American women are obsessed with weight. The men talk of gain, the women talk of loss, and I do not know which talk is the more boring.
author: Marya Mannes

quote: Who covets more is evermore a slave.
author: Robert Herrick

quote: When a big company lays you off, they often give you a year's salary to 'go pursue a dream.' If you're stupid, you panic and get another job. If you're smart, you take the money and use the time to figure out what you want to do next.
author: Bruce Schneier

quote: My money goes to my agent, then to my accountant and from him to the tax man.
author: Glenda Jackson

quote: Folks can't carry around money in their pocket. They've got to go to an ATM machine, and they've got to pay a few dollars to get their own dollars out of the machine. Who ever thought you'd pay cash to get cash? That's where we've gotten to.
author: Bill Janklow

quote: There's not enough money in the world to get me singing 'Because We Want To' again. I wouldn't do it. I think Beyonce Knowles got a couple of million for a private show but I would be happy to turn it down.
author: Billie Piper

quote: You know, a lot of people are just interested in, in building a company so they can make money and get out.
author: Arthur Rock

quote: My father was a Presbyterian minister, working among the poor in West Virginia. He had taken what amounted to a vow of poverty when he accepted that call and so we never had much money.
author: James Green Somerville

quote: The record company started as an adjunct to that, to give young composers their first recorded performances; to give young musicians their first debut on a recording. These are all things that big record companies would never touch because there is no money in it!
author: Gunther Schuller

quote: The times of Arab nationalism and unity are gone forever. These ideas which mobilized the masses are only a worthless currency. Libya has had to put up with too much from the Arabs for whom it has poured forth both blood and money.
author: Muammar al-Gaddafi

quote: I think everything depends on money.
author: Alan Bean

quote: Those who are of the opinion that money will do everything may reasonably be expected to do everything for money.
author: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

quote: After a certain point, money is meaningless. It ceases to be the goal. The game is what counts.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: If the money we donate helps one child or can ease the pain of one parent, those funds are well spent.
author: Carl Karcher

quote: I want to be an advocate for the people who don't have time to read the newspaper... or the money to make a political contribution.
author: Richard J. Codey

quote: I'm not looking at money, percentage points or grosses. This is my life, you know? To me, every day matters.
author: Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio

quote: Wealth often takes away chances from men as well as poverty. There is none to tell the rich to go on striving, for a rich man makes the law that hallows and hollows his own life.
author: Sean O'Casey

quote: I used to say when I was working in the theater that if I ever had five seasons of a hit TV show I'd never have to worry about money and wouldn't have to do anything I didn't want to do.
author: Jerry Orbach

quote: We don't have the money in America to keep paying for the education of everybody else's children from around the world. We simply don't have the financial resources to do that.
author: Mo Brooks

quote: Why are we here? I think many people assume, wrongly, that a company exists solely to make money. Money is an important part of a company's existence, if the company is any good. But a result is not a cause. We have to go deeper and find the real reason for our being.
author: David Packard

quote: I am responsible for managing more schoolteachers' and firemen's money than anybody in the world. That's an enormous responsibility.
author: Laurence D. Fink

quote: Wet Hot American Summer so far is a financial disappointment and money was lost on it. But perhaps it will find its audience in video, cable, etc, maybe over the course of years.
author: David Wain

quote: HATE, even if it's making money. is an underground movie, that's how it was made. It's a film about police brutality in the largest sense, it's about the whole of society and not just about the hood.
author: Mathieu Kassovitz

quote: The creditor hath a better memory than the debtor.
author: James Howell

quote: Art for art's sake, money for God's sake.
author: Simon Raven

quote: A fool and his money get a lot of publicity.
author: Al Bernstein

quote: Business is other people's money.
author: Delphine de Girardin

quote: People are looking around. They are looking to do something with their time and money. The question is, what?
author: John Simon

quote: Money is just a way of keeping score.
author: H. L. Hunt

quote: Thirteen thousand dollars a year is not enough to raise a family. That's not enough to pay your bills and save for their future. That's barely enough to provide for even the most basic needs.
author: Thomas Carper

quote: The President must stop gambling with taxpayers' money and get the country back on the path of fiscal sanity.
author: Tom Harkin

quote: If I can't play for big money, I play for a little money. And if I can't play for a little money, I stay in bed that day.
author: Bobby Riggs

quote: Many good qualities are not sufficient to balance a single want - the want of money.
author: Johann Georg Zimmermann

quote: In suggesting gifts: Money is appropriate, and one size fits all.
author: William Randolph Hearst

quote: It's a terribly hard job to spend a billion dollars and get your money's worth.
author: George M. Humphrey

quote: All my life I knew that there was all the money you could want out there. All you have to do is go after it.
author: Curtis Carlson

quote: A man with money is no match against a man on a mission.
author: Doyle Brunson

quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Education is not preparation for life education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

quote: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: You have to stay in school. You have to. You have to go to college. You have to get your degree. Because that's the one thing people can't take away from you is your education. And it is worth the investment.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
author: Maimonides

quote: Education is the foundation upon which we build our future.
author: Christine Gregoire

quote: Education comes from within you get it by struggle and effort and thought.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The highest result of education is tolerance.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.
author: Conrad Hall

quote: Early childhood education is the key to the betterment of society.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: Cauliflower is nothing but cabbage with a college education.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Education is a shared commitment between dedicated teachers, motivated students and enthusiastic parents with high expectations.
author: Bob Beauprez

quote: A person who won't read has no advantage over one who can't read.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Creativity is the key to success in the future, and primary education is where teachers can bring creativity in children at that level.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: The cost of college education today is so high that many young people are giving up their dream of going to college, while many others are graduating deeply in debt.
author: Bernie Sanders

quote: Education is a weapon whose effects depend on who holds it in his hands and at whom it is aimed.
author: Joseph Stalin

quote: To educate a man in mind and not in morals is to educate a menace to society.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Illegal immigration is crisis for our country. It is an open door for drugs, criminals, and potential terrorists to enter our country. It is straining our economy, adding costs to our judicial, healthcare, and education systems.
author: Timothy Murphy

quote: The American Dream is one of success, home ownership, college education for one's children, and have a secure job to provide these and other goals.
author: Leonard Boswell

quote: Don't let schooling interfere with your education.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I no have education. I have inspiration. If I was educated, I would be a damn fool.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Education is for improving the lives of others and for leaving your community and world better than you found it.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: Until justice is blind to color, until education is unaware of race, until opportunity is unconcerned with the color of men's skins, emancipation will be a proclamation but not a fact.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: If a man neglects education, he walks lame to the end of his life.
author: Plato

quote: Through my education, I didn't just develop skills, I didn't just develop the ability to learn, but I developed confidence.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: There is no greater education than one that is self-driven.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: I believed in studying just because I knew education was a privilege. It was the discipline of study, to get into the habit of doing something that you don't want to do.
author: Wynton Marsalis

quote: Education is an ornament in prosperity and a refuge in adversity.
author: Aristotle

quote: In some parts of the world, students are going to school every day. It's their normal life. But in other part of the world, we are starving for education... it's like a precious gift. It's like a diamond.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Real education enhances the dignity of a human being and increases his or her self-respect. If only the real sense of education could be realized by each individual and carried forward in every field of human activity, the world will be so much a better place to live in.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: There are many problems, but I think there is a solution to all these problems; it's just one, and it's education.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: I don't think there should be more gun control. I think there should be more education.
author: Sam Brownback

quote: Education, therefore, is a process of living and not a preparation for future living.
author: John Dewey

quote: A human being is not attaining his full heights until he is educated.
author: Horace Mann

quote: Men are born ignorant, not stupid. They are made stupid by education.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: You have to go through the falling down in order to learn to walk. It helps to know that you can survive it. That's an education in itself.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: A captain of the Navy ought to be a man of strong and well connected sense, with a tolerable good education, a gentleman, as well as a seaman both in theory and practice.
author: John Paul Jones

quote: Education is the key to the future: You've heard it a million times, and it's not wrong. Educated people have higher wages and lower unemployment rates, and better-educated countries grow faster and innovate more than other countries. But going to college is not enough. You also have to study the right subjects.
author: Alex Tabarrok

quote: It is a miracle that curiosity survives formal education.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Our future growth relies on competitiveness and innovation, skills and productivity... and these in turn rely on the education of our people.
author: Julia Gillard

quote: The paradox of education is precisely this - that as one begins to become conscious one begins to examine the society in which he is being educated.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: Education is all a matter of building bridges.
author: Ralph Ellison

quote: Genius without education is like silver in the mine.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Nine tenths of education is encouragement.
author: Anatole France

quote: Without education, you are not going anywhere in this world.
author: Malcolm X

quote: The illiterate of the future will not be the person who cannot read. It will be the person who does not know how to learn.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: An arts education helps build academic skills and increase academic performance, while also providing alternative opportunities to reward the skills of children who learn differently.
author: Gavin Newsom

quote: To read without reflecting is like eating without digesting.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Public education is our greatest pathway to opportunity in America. So we need to invest in and strengthen our public universities today, and for generations to come.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: You may be a redneck if... you have spent more on your pickup truck than on your education.
author: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: A system of education is not one thing, nor does it have a single definite object, nor is it a mere matter of schools. Education is that whole system of human training within and without the school house walls, which molds and develops men.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: That's the value of a college education... I don't know anywhere in the world where you can make an investment and make that kind of return.
author: Gaston Caperton

quote: Learn to think continentally.
author: Alexander Hamilton

quote: I believe that education is all about being excited about something. Seeing passion and enthusiasm helps push an educational message.
author: Steve Irwin

quote: To defend a country you need an army, but to defend a civilization you need education.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: Education's purpose is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: All I want is an education, and I am afraid of no one.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: To accuse others for one's own misfortunes is a sign of want of education. To accuse oneself shows that one's education has begun. To accuse neither oneself nor others shows that one's education is complete.
author: Epictetus

quote: The idea of education has been so tied to schools, universities, and professors that many assume there is no other way, but education is available to anyone within reach of a library, a post office, or even a newsstand.
author: Louis L'Amour

quote: Education is our only political safety. Outside of this ark all is deluge.
author: Horace Mann

quote: The education of a man is never completed until he dies.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: I need to complete my homework on time.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Reformation, like education, is a journey, not a destination.
author: Mary Harris Jones

quote: Education is not only a ladder of opportunity, but it is also an investment in our future.
author: Ed Markey

quote: Education can give you a skill, but a liberal education can give you dignity.
author: Ellen Key

quote: The Negro race, like all races, is going to be saved by its exceptional men. The problem of education, then, among Negroes must first of all deal with the Talented Tenth; it is the problem of developing the Best of this race that they may guide the Mass away from the contamination and death of the Worst, in their own and other races.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: Education alone can conduct us to that enjoyment which is, at once, best in quality and infinite in quantity.
author: Horace Mann

quote: Education is a continual process, it's like a bicycle... If you don't pedal you don't go forward.
author: George Weah

quote: Encouragement of higher education for our youth is critical to the success of our collective future.
author: Charles B. Rangel

quote: Education must, be not only a transmission of culture but also a provider of alternative views of the world and a strengthener of the will to explore them.
author: Jerome Bruner

quote: Education is and will be the most powerful tool for individual and social change, and we must do all that it takes to facilitate it.
author: Shiv Nadar

quote: Upon the subject of education, not presuming to dictate any plan or system respecting it, I can only say that I view it as the most important subject which we, as a people, can be engaged in.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Information, education, skills, healthcare, livelihood, financial inclusion, small and village enterprises, opportunities for women, conservation of natural resources, distributed clean energy - entirely new possibilities have emerged to change the development model.
author: Narendra Modi

quote: Inclusive, good-quality education is a foundation for dynamic and equitable societies.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: I think a college education is important no matter what you do in life.
author: Phil Mickelson

quote: Without education, your children can never really meet the challenges they will face. So it's very important to give children education and explain that they should play a role for their country.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: I never let schooling interfere with my education.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car; but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Economists who have studied the relationship between education and economic growth confirm what common sense suggests: The number of college degrees is not nearly as important as how well students develop cognitive skills, such as critical thinking and problem-solving ability.
author: Derek Bok

quote: I think people understand that if you're going to have a successful economy, you need people's potential to be realized. That means education. It means university education, sure, but it also means training, apprenticeships and various kinds of skills diplomas that we know are necessary.
author: Justin Trudeau

quote: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future in life.
author: Plato

quote: You can't have a university without having free speech, even though at times it makes us terribly uncomfortable. If students are not going to hear controversial ideas on college campuses, they're not going to hear them in America. I believe it's part of their education.
author: Donna Shalala

quote: Academic qualifications are important and so is financial education. They're both important and schools are forgetting one of them.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Poor is the pupil who does not surpass his master.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I have always had this view about the modern education system: we pay attention to brain development, but the development of warmheartedness we take for granted.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: During the first few months of an infant's life, its manner of taking the breast, of laying its head on the pillow, etc., becomes crystallized into imperative habits. This is why education must begin in the cradle.
author: Jean Piaget

quote: I wanted to race cars. I didn't like school, and all I wanted to do was work on cars. But right before I graduated, I got into a really bad car accident, and I spent that summer in the hospital thinking about where I was heading. I decided to take education more seriously and go to a community college.
author: George Lucas

quote: If a man's wit be wandering, let him study the mathematics.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: If you have four years to complete your college education, do it.
author: Bo Jackson

quote: The developing world is full of entrepreneurs and visionaries, who with access to education, equity and credit would play a key role in developing the economic situations in their countries.
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: If I were again beginning my studies, I would follow the advice of Plato and start with mathematics.
author: Galileo Galilei

quote: Middle class families are struggling to send their sons and daughters to school. For many Americans, a college education is essential to future success.
author: Albio Sires

quote: When you have solved the problem of controlling the attention of the child, you have solved the entire problem of its education.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: The true purpose of education is to teach a man to carry himself triumphant to the sunset.
author: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quote: In the long run, your human capital is your main base of competition. Your leading indicator of where you're going to be 20 years from now is how well you're doing in your education system.
author: Bill Gates

quote: You can't legislate good will - that comes through education.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Research has shown time and time again that infants who receive the high-quality child care and early education programs do better in school, have more developed social skills, and display fewer behavior problems.
author: Judy Biggert

quote: You must get an education. You must go to school, and you must learn to protect yourself. And you must learn to protect yourself with the pen, and not the gun.
author: Josephine Baker

quote: Economic prosperity and quality education for our children are inexorably linked.
author: Jon Huntsman, Jr.

quote: In fact, I believe that we need better sex education in our own culture, here in America, so that young folk learn about things like venereal disease before they encounter it.
author: Piers Anthony

quote: Next in importance to freedom and justice is popular education, without which neither freedom nor justice can be permanently maintained.
author: James A. Garfield

quote: The economy is the start and end of everything. You can't have successful education reform or any other reform if you don't have a strong economy.
author: David Cameron

quote: Everybody is ignorant, only on different subjects.
author: Will Rogers

quote: One of the most powerful tools for empowering individuals and communities is making certain that any individual who wants to receive a quality education can do so.
author: Christine Gregoire

quote: Good questions outrank easy answers.
author: Paul Samuelson

quote: The need for a college education is even more important now than it was before, but I think that the increased costs are a very severe obstacle to access. It is an American dream, and I think that one of our challenges is to find a way to make that available.
author: Roy Romer

quote: Education is indoctrination if you're white - subjugation if you're black.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: Education forms the common mind. Just as the twig is bent, the tree's inclined.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: It's not enough to train today's workforce. We also have to prepare tomorrow's workforce by guaranteeing every child access to a world-class education.
author: Barack Obama

quote: If you want to be an anthropologist, you need to study physical anthropology specialized in bones. If you want to be a forensic chemist, get a degree in chemistry. Do you want to do DNA work? Get a degree in microbiology. And do well. Study hard and go to graduate school.
author: Kathy Reichs

quote: Prejudices, it is well known, are most difficult to eradicate from the heart whose soil has never been loosened or fertilized by education; they grow firm there, firm as weeds among stones.
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: The highest education is that which does not merely give us information but makes our life in harmony with all existence.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: The most valuable of all education is the ability to make yourself do the thing you have to do, when it has to be done, whether you like it or not.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: It is only as we develop others that we permanently succeed.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: Economists report that a college education adds many thousands of dollars to a man's lifetime income - which he then spends sending his son to college.
author: Bill Vaughan

quote: You can't continue to have higher education tuition grow at a multiple of the rate of inflation.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Education, housing and hospitals are the most important things for society.
author: Zaha Hadid

quote: Cutting the deficit by gutting our investments in innovation and education is like lightening an overloaded airplane by removing its engine. It may make you feel like you're flying high at first, but it won't take long before you feel the impact.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Education and work are the levers to uplift a people.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: So if a college education is indispensable, the challenge as I see it is how to make it more accessible.
author: Gordon Gee

quote: The things I want to know are in books my best friend is the man who'll get me a book I ain't read.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I think everyone should go to college and get a degree and then spend six months as a bartender and six months as a cabdriver. Then they would really be educated.
author: Al McGuire

quote: The great difficulty in education is to get experience out of ideas.
author: George Santayana

quote: My mother said I must always be intolerant of ignorance but understanding of illiteracy. That some people, unable to go to school, were more educated and more intelligent than college professors.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Liberating education consists in acts of cognition, not transferrals of information.
author: Paulo Freire

quote: Good education is so important. We do need to look at the way people are taught. It not just about qualifications to get a job. It's about being educated.
author: Zaha Hadid

quote: Education is important because, first of all, people need to know that discrimination still exists. It is still real in the workplace, and we should not take that for granted.
author: Alexis Herman

quote: The higher amount you put into higher education, at the federal level particularly, the more the price of higher education rises. It's the dog that never catches its tail. You increase student loans, you increase grants, you increase Pell grants, Stafford loans, and what happens? They raise the price.
author: Bill Bennett

quote: We Americans have the great gifts of freedom and democracy, but it has been our education system that has fulfilled the promise of democracy.
author: James E. Rogers

quote: There are three major social issues that this country is struggling with: education, poverty, and drugs. Two of them we talk about, and one of them we don't.
author: Steven Soderbergh

quote: Through hard work and education, we can deliver a strong economy and opportunity for all.
author: Julia Gillard

quote: My education was paid for by the RAF Benevolent Fund, so a charity school, run like an orphanage, with uniforms and beatings. It was tough, but it got me to Cambridge - like being a chrysalis suddenly becoming a butterfly.
author: Eric Idle

quote: Our progress as a nation can be no swifter than our progress in education. The human mind is our fundamental resource.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: No other investment yields as great a return as the investment in education. An educated workforce is the foundation of every community and the future of every economy.
author: Brad Henry

quote: Education in this country is about how to maintain the status quo and to perpetuate racism.
author: Jane Elliot

quote: A State which has universal suffrage and a wide extension of the jury franchise, must qualify the people by education to rightly exercise the great powers with which they are invested.
author: Edmund Barton

quote: We need innovation in education and dedication to the task before us.
author: Alan Autry

quote: Yeah, I'm a thrill seeker, but crikey, education's the most important thing.
author: Steve Irwin

quote: Too much of what is called 'education' is little more than an expensive isolation from reality.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: To throw obstacles in the way of a complete education is like putting out the eyes.
author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: Salsa, classic rock, soul music, jazz... all of that was a part of my education in making hip-hop music.
author: Aloe Blacc

quote: Popular culture bombards us with examples of animals being humanized for all sorts of purposes, ranging from education to entertainment to satire to propaganda. Walt Disney, for example, made us forget that Mickey is a mouse, and Donald a duck. George Orwell laid a cover of human societal ills over a population of livestock.
author: Frans de Waal

quote: Bebop and hip-hop, in so many ways, they're connected. A lot of rappers remind me so much of bebop guys in terms of improvisation, beats and rhymes. My dream is to see hip-hop incorporated in education. You've got the youth of the world in the palm of your hand.
author: Quincy Jones

quote: The rising costs of higher education coupled with the stress of paying student loans are putting increasing pressure on students.
author: Hank Johnson

quote: No matter what happens on the field, getting an education makes you a winner.
author: Lou Holtz
