quote: If we live good lives, the times are also good. As we are, such are the times.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: You don't have to be the Dalai Lama to tell people that life's about change.
author: John Cleese

quote: Execute every act of thy life as though it were thy last.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: To live is to change, and to be perfect is to have changed often.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: Character develops itself in the stream of life.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Life itself still remains a very effective therapist.
author: Karen Horney

quote: The most satisfying thing in life is to have been able to give a large part of one's self to others.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: All I really need to know... I learned in kindergarten.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: Life is painting a picture, not doing a sum.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
author: Seneca

quote: Life is a DNA software system.
author: Craig Venter

quote: All of life is peaks and valleys. Don't let the peaks get too high and the valleys too low.
author: John Wooden

quote: We can't plan life. All we can do is be available for it.
author: Lauryn Hill

quote: Life leaps like a geyser for those who drill through the rock of inertia.
author: Alexis Carrel

quote: Nearly all the best things that came to me in life have been unexpected, unplanned by me.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: I think I've discovered the secret of life - you just hang around until you get used to it.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: When life is too easy for us, we must beware or we may not be ready to meet the blows which sooner or later come to everyone, rich or poor.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I am an artist... I am here to live out loud.
author: Emile Zola

quote: I want to live my life, not record it.
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: Any life is made up of a single moment, the moment in which a man finds out, once and for all, who he is.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: What we play is life.
author: Louis Armstrong

quote: Only an artist can interpret the meaning of life.
author: Novalis

quote: It is often said that before you die your life passes before your eyes. It is in fact true. It's called living.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: This life is worth living, we can say, since it is what we make it.
author: William James

quote: We are here to add what we can to life, not to get what we can from life.
author: William Osler

quote: I bear a charmed life.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: That it will never come again is what makes life sweet.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: The less routine the more life.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: To me, if life boils down to one thing, it's movement. To live is to keep moving.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: We are to seek wisdom and understanding only in the length of days.
author: Robert Hall

quote: You get into your late fifties, people start falling like flies all around you. I don't take life for granted any more. I'm really glad to be here.
author: Tom Petty

quote: Life becomes harder for us when we live for others, but it also becomes richer and happier.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: I have a simple philosophy: Fill what's empty. Empty what's full. Scratch where it itches.
author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quote: The indispensable first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: decide what you want.
author: Ben Stein

quote: Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity, or registering wrongs.
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: Life is a succession of moments, to live each one is to succeed.
author: Corita Kent

quote: To know nothing is the happiest life.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: It's only when we truly know and understand that we have a limited time on earth - and that we have no way of knowing when our time is up, we will then begin to live each day to the fullest, as if it was the only one we had.
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood. All is riddle, and the key to a riddle is another riddle.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life consists in what a man is thinking of all day.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: There is just one life for each of us: our own.
author: Euripides

quote: Life is something to do when you can't get to sleep.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Give me the luxuries of life and I will willingly do without the necessities.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: The man who has no inner-life is a slave to his surroundings.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: To affect the quality of the day, that is the highest of arts.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Life is largely a matter of expectation.
author: Horace

quote: Remember when life's path is steep to keep your mind even.
author: Horace

quote: Our entire life - consists ultimately in accepting ourselves as we are.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: What is important in life is life, and not the result of life.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I am I plus my circumstances.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: We cannot put off living until we are ready.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: Life well spent is long.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: To be able to look back upon one's past life with satisfaction is to live twice.
author: Lord Acton

quote: Each day is the scholar of yesterday.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: We live in the world when we love it.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Here is the test to find whether your mission on Earth is finished: if you're alive, it isn't.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Don't let life discourage you everyone who got where he is had to begin where he was.
author: Richard L. Evans

quote: Most people have never learned that one of the main aims in life is to enjoy it.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: To live is like to love - all reason is against it, and all healthy instinct for it.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Who cares about great marks left behind? We have one life... just one. Our life. We have nothing else.
author: Ugo Betti

quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need.
author: Vernon Howard

quote: We are all here for a spell, get all the good laughs you can.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Seventy percent of success in life is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: I am simply trying to struggle through life trying to do God's bidding.
author: George Lucas

quote: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
author: Grandma Moses

quote: Life is growth. If we stop growing, technically and spiritually, we are as good as dead.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Life has meaning only if one barters it day by day for something other than itself.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: The difficulty in life is the choice.
author: George A. Moore

quote: Life will always be to a large extent what we ourselves make it.
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: Conduct is three-fourths of our life and its largest concern.
author: Matthew Arnold

quote: Change is not merely necessary to life - it is life.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: The most exhausting thing in life is being insincere.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Life is a series of collisions with the future; it is not the sum of what we have been, but what we yearn to be.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: Life is very short and what we have to do must be done in the now.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: I love life because what more is there?
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Not a shred of evidence exists in favor of the idea that life is serious.
author: Brendan Gill

quote: Fortunately analysis is not the only way to resolve inner conflicts. Life itself still remains a very effective therapist.
author: Karen Horney

quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.
author: James Allen

quote: A person will sometimes devote all his life to the development of one part of his body - the wishbone.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Life is too short to work so hard.
author: Vivien Leigh

quote: Life is a lively process of becoming.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: The whole secret of life is to be interested in one thing profoundly and in a thousand things well.
author: Horace Walpole

quote: The greatest use of a life is to spend it on something that will outlast it.
author: William James

quote: Don't go through life, grow through life.
author: Eric Butterworth

quote: The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions.
author: Alfred Adler

quote: Life's more amusing than we thought.
author: Andrew Lang

quote: Life is a gift, given in trust - like a child.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: What a wonderful life I've had! I only wish I'd realized it sooner.
author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: Ships that pass in the night, and speak each other in passing, only a signal shown, and a distant voice in the darkness; So on the ocean of life, we pass and speak one another, only a look and a voice, then darkness again and a silence.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: I don't expect to live forever, but I do intend to hang on as long as possible.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: How sweet it is!
author: Jackie Gleason

quote: While we are postponing, life speeds by.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: We pass through this world but once.
author: Stephen Jay Gould

quote: In this world, with thy earthly life, thou art under heaven, stars, and elements, also under hell and devils; all ruleth in thee, and over thee.
author: Jakob Bohme

quote: Life's a fight. It's a good fight of faith.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: To live is to think.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: When I was a little kid, we only knew about our nine planets. Since then, we've downgraded Pluto but have discovered that other solar systems and stars are common. So life is probably quite prevalent.
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: Life is not an exact science, it is an art.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: My trade and art is to live.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Wrong life cannot be lived rightly.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: Life is anything that dies when you stomp on it.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Wars and elections are both too big and too small to matter in the long run. The daily work - that goes on, it adds up.
author: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: Life is a horizontal fall.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: Life is half spent before we know what it is.
author: George Herbert

quote: Every man regards his own life as the New Year's Eve of time.
author: Jean Paul

quote: I take a simple view of life. It is keep your eyes open and get on with it.
author: Laurence Sterne

quote: Life has a higher end, than to be amused.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: Life is a work in progress.
author: Jeff Rich

quote: I have inspiration and feelings of being alive most every day I live.
author: Judy Collins

quote: He is a man, who is to be a man, the fruit is always present in the seed.
author: Tertullian

quote: I had no blood relatives till I made some.
author: Andy Dick

quote: The fear of life is the favorite disease of the 20th century.
author: William Lyon Phelps

quote: The real business of life is trying to understand each other.
author: Gilbert Parker

quote: Life comes from the earth and life returns to the earth.
author: Zhuangzi

quote: My life is every moment of my life. It is not a culmination of the past.
author: Hugh Leonard

quote: Nobody got where they are today by living for tomorrow.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: The dearest days in one's life are those that seem very far and very near at once.
author: Abraham Cahan

quote: Life is much shorter than I imagined it to be.
author: Abraham Cahan

quote: The person lives twice who lives the first life well.
author: Robert Herrick

quote: I am all for the short and merry life.
author: Edward Fitzgerald

quote: Unrest of spirit is a mark of life.
author: Karl A. Menninger

quote: A little credulity helps one on through life very smoothly.
author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quote: If life had a second edition, how I would correct the proofs.
author: John Clare

quote: I look back on my life like a good day's work, it was done and I am satisfied with it.
author: Grandma Moses

quote: Life is never easy for those who dream.
author: Robert James Waller

quote: Nothing you wear is more important than your smile.
author: Connie Stevens

quote: Smile, it is the key that fits the lock of everybody's heart.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: I never get tired of smiling. I'm just the kind of guy who likes to smile.
author: Jason Ritter

quote: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I can't change my personality. I'll always smile, but I'll be more focused.
author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

quote: Smile, it's free therapy.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: Remember even though the outside world might be raining, if you keep on smiling the sun will soon show its face and smile back at you.
author: Anna Lee

quote: The main thing that you have to remember on this journey is, just be nice to everyone and always smile.
author: Ed Sheeran

quote: Someone told me the smile on my face gets bigger when I play the guitar.
author: Niall Horan

quote: Most smiles are started by another smile.
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: I enjoy jokes, smiling, and making people smile. I may be a little different, but that's OK, who wants to be normal anyway?
author: Tim Duncan

quote: I like to smile when its natural. I'm not mad or anything. That's my style.
author: Jesse McCartney

quote: Children learn to smile from their parents.
author: Shinichi Suzuki

quote: Smile, smile, smile at your mind as often as possible. Your smiling will considerably reduce your mind's tearing tension.
author: Sri Chinmoy

quote: If the world's a veil of tears, Smile till rainbows span it.
author: Lucy Larcom

quote: Everyone looks so much better when they smile.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.
author: Washington Irving

quote: I'm really exciting. I smile a lot, I win a lot, and I'm really sexy.
author: Serena Williams

quote: Wear a smile and have friends wear a scowl and have wrinkles.
author: George Eliot

quote: Real men laugh at opposition real men smile when enemies appear.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: First, I want to pay tribute to Diana myself. She was an exceptional and gifted human being. In good times and bad, she never lost her capacity to smile and laugh, nor to inspire others with her warmth and kindness. I admired and respected her - for her energy and commitment to others, and especially for her devotion to her two boys.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: Show me a smile, and I'll show you one back.
author: Vanilla Ice

quote: Always wear a smile because you never know who is watching.
author: Gracie Gold

quote: People ask me to smile for the camera, but somehow it always comes out gloomy.
author: Stephen Rea

quote: Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: A smile is so sexy, yet so warm. When someone genuinely smiles at you, it's the greatest feeling in the world.
author: Mandy Moore

quote: If you smile when no one else is around, you really mean it.
author: Andy Rooney

quote: My cheeks explode when I smile. That's why I have to look so nonplussed.
author: Rufus Wainwright

quote: Don't disrespect me, lie about it, and then come smile in my face and act like nothing's wrong.
author: Scottie Pippen

quote: Even if you're unhappy, just pretend that you're happy. Eventually, your smile will be contagious to yourself. I had to learn that. I used to think, 'I'm being fake,' but you know what? Better to be fake and happy than real and miserable.
author: Evangeline Lilly

quote: We all have our down days, but it's not hard to smile and say, 'Thank you.'
author: Yvette Nicole Brown

quote: Sarcasm helps me overcome the harshness of the reality we live, eases the pain of scars and makes people smile.
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Id rather have a fake smile than a nasty stare.
author: Tamara Ecclestone

quote: Smile. It instantly lifts the face, and it just lights up the room.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: People don't know that when there is something running in my mind, I start smiling. If I'm angry, I smile and blush.
author: Hansika Motwani

quote: Look back, and smile on perils past.
author: Walter Scott

quote: Smile, for everyone lacks self-confidence and more than any other one thing a smile reassures them.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: Nobody needs a smile so much as the one who has none to give. So get used to smiling heart-warming smiles, and you will spread sunshine in a sometimes dreary world.
author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quote: Good Deeds Day is based on a simple idea that every person can do a good deed for the benefit of others and the planet. Even a smile that brightens someone else's day is a good deed. I initiated Good Deeds Day to spread the message that everyone can give of themselves, according to their heart's desire.
author: Shari Arison

quote: I wake up each and every day with a smile on my face knowing I get to do something musically.
author: Two Chainz

quote: A smile is like an instant facelift and an instant mood lift.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: I used to rely on black-and-white, and while I was working on 'Smile,' I learned to adapt to color on my end.
author: Raina Telgemeier

quote: Virtue is not photogenic. What is it to be a nice guy? To be nothing, that's what. A big fat zero with a smile for everybody.
author: Kirk Douglas

quote: I like joy; I want to be joyous; I want to have fun on the set; I want to wear beautiful clothes and look pretty. I want to smile, and I want to make people laugh. And that's all I want. I like it. I like being happy. I want to make others happy.
author: Doris Day

quote: Always wear a smile sometime during the day - it makes you feel happier and look younger.
author: Kylie Bax

quote: Yes sir, I am a tortured man for all seasons, as they say, and I have powerful friends in high places. Birds sing where I walk, and children smile when they see me coming.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: A beautiful person is someone who stays true to themselves and their spirit someone who is self-confident and can make you smile.
author: Helena Christensen

quote: I believe that when you put a smile out there, you get a smile back.
author: Heidi Klum

quote: Empathy is the faculty to resonate with the feelings of others. When we meet someone who is joyful, we smile. When we witness someone in pain, we suffer in resonance with his or her suffering.
author: Matthieu Ricard

quote: The purpose of Disneyland is to make people smile.
author: Kevin Plank

quote: I'm a very outgoing person. I'm always happy, I'm one of those people who are always smiling. If somebody described me to somebody else, they'd say the kid with the curly hair with the big smile on his face. I get along with everybody.
author: Corbin Bleu

quote: I was one of those weird kids who didn't really speak or smile. I remember my teachers would call home and ask if everything was fine at home because I would never smile. Then I got into this phase, from maybe fourth to eighth grade, where my personality just did a 180.
author: Alessia Cara

quote: I didn't know how to smile for the paparazzi.
author: Peggy Lipton

quote: The flower in the vase smiles, but no longer laughs.
author: Malcolm de Chazal

quote: I never smile unless I mean it.
author: Donny Osmond

quote: When I look out at the people and they look at me and they're smiling, then I know that I'm loved. That is the time when I have no worries, no problems.
author: Etta James

quote: There's something about the ukulele that just makes you smile. It makes you let your guard down. It brings out the child in all of us.
author: Jake Shimabukuro

quote: Don't write anything you can phone. Don't phone anything you can talk. Don't talk anything you can whisper. Don't whisper anything you can smile. Don't smile anything you can nod. Don't nod anything you can wink.
author: Earl Long

quote: I actually used to smile a lot in pictures. I think I only stopped smiling when I got into fashion. Fashion stole my smile!
author: Victoria Beckham

quote: Standing as a witness in all things means being kind in all things, being the first to say hello, being the first to smile, being the first to make the stranger feel a part of things, being helpful, thinking of others' feelings, being inclusive.
author: Margaret D. Nadauld

quote: Great men show politeness in a particular way; a smile suffices to assure you that you are welcome, and keep about their avocations as if you were a member of the family.
author: John James Audubon

quote: It's so hard not to smile.
author: Zoe Sugg

quote: The catch phrase for the day is 'Do an act of kindness. Help one person smile.'
author: Harvey Ball

quote: And if you see me, smile and maybe give me a hug. That's important to me too.
author: Jim Valvano

quote: Smile at a stranger. See what happens.
author: Patti LuPone

quote: Never a lip is curved with pain that can't be kissed into smiles again.
author: Bret Harte

quote: I have a nice smile, pretty lips, and big round cheeks. They help me look like a teenager.
author: Gabourey Sidibe

quote: She felt like a chess player who, by the clever handling of his pieces, sees the game taking the course intended. Her eyes were bright and tender with a smile as they glanced up into his; and her lips looked hungry for the kiss which they invited.
author: Kate Chopin

quote: I think I've always had a certain amount of skepticism of this whole 'shut up and smile' theory. I haven't ever swallowed that pill so easily, although I tried.
author: Amber Heard

quote: Power doesn't back up in the face of a smile, or in the face of a threat of some kind of nonviolent loving action. It's not the nature of power to back up in the face of anything but some more power.
author: Malcolm X

quote: We smile at the ignorance of the savage who cuts down the tree in order to reach its fruit but the same blunder is made by every person who is over eager and impatient in the pursuit of pleasure.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: And the smile that is worth the praises of earth is the smile that shines through tears.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: They might not need me but they might. I'll let my head be just in sight a smile as small as mine might be precisely their necessity.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Laughter is day, and sobriety is night; a smile is the twilight that hovers gently between both, more bewitching than either.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: To smile at the jest which plants a thorn in another's breast is to become a principal in the mischief.
author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quote: I've never wanted anybody to like me because I had long hair or short hair, or that they liked the way I dressed or they liked the way I dressed or they liked the way I smile.
author: David Allan Coe

quote: Winning the World Cup was very special because it meant so much to so many. One thing about our country that is constant is cricket. The smile it brought to people's faces was the thing I shall always remember. It reminded me, reminded all of us, of our importance to the lives of the Indian people less lucky than we are.
author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

quote: You have to promote yourself you have to have this smile on your face all the time and be this nice guy - which I am!
author: Craig Roberts

quote: When you smile, you don't only appear to be more likable and courteous, you appear to be more competent.
author: Ron Gutman

quote: Not by appointment do we meet delight Or joy they heed not our expectancy But round some corner of the streets of life they of a sudden greet us with a smile.
author: Gerald Massey

quote: A smile is a facelift that's in everyone's price range!
author: Tom Wilson

quote: I feel like a little kid who just walked into a candy store. I think that's something to smile about.
author: Brandon Boyd

quote: Breathing in, I am aware of my heart. Breathing out, I smile to my heart and know that my heart still functions normally. I feel grateful for my heart.
author: Nhat Hanh

quote: A tip for looking 'picture perfect' is probably a smile. I think everyone looks better when they are happy you give off a glow - or at least that is what my mum would say!
author: Amber Le Bon

quote: Each one of us can do a good deed, every day and everywhere. In hospitals in desperate need of volunteers, in homes for the elderly where our parents and grandparents are longing for a smile, a listening ear, in the street, in our workplaces and especially at home.
author: Shari Arison

quote: Once every lunar eclipse, you should be able to see me smile!
author: Sophie Turner

quote: I don't know what I would have done without believing in God. His support gives me power and energy to continue to be optimistic, to smile, not to be depressed. Sometimes, if things are not going so well, I don't cry. I say maybe it's meant to be.
author: Ofra Haza

quote: She gave me a smile I could feel in my hip pocket.
author: Raymond Chandler

quote: You know, I've got wrinkles on my forehead and smile lines, but what's wrong with that? I love to smile.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: The bat is gone, but the smile remains.
author: Willie Stargell

quote: When I see people laughing at ideas and companies we have backed, I smile. It means we are going to make a lot of money on that investment.
author: Fred Wilson

quote: It is impossible to persuade a man who does not disagree, but smiles.
author: Muriel Spark

quote: The company of fools may first make us smile, but in the end we always feel melancholy.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: I want to touch the heart of the world and make it smile.
author: Charles de Lint

quote: I think that anybody that smiles automatically looks better.
author: Diane Lane

quote: I've always spent more time with a smile on my face than not, but the thing is, I don't write about it.
author: Robert Smith

quote: It takes a man to suffer ignorance and smile.
author: Sting

quote: One of the most important responsibilities in the Christian life is to care about others, smile at them, and be a friend to the friendless.
author: James Dobson

quote: Get up and dance, get up and smile, get up and drink to the days that are gone in the shortest while.
author: Simon Fowler

quote: We may smile at these matters, but they are melancholy illustrations.
author: Joseph Howe

quote: You see, with me, when I'm nervous, I smile and laugh.
author: Paula Radcliffe

quote: Well, there's nothing more touching than putting a smile on a kid's face when you can.
author: Emma Roberts

quote: Some people say they have a thirst for life. They're excited about every day and they're prepared to look the bad and the good straight in the face and greet it all with a smile. I like to think I'm one of those people.
author: Amy Jo Martin

quote: I don't think I was a good model. I think I was born to emote and act. I would walk down the ramp and smile and they used to say, 'Give us a blank look.' It was really difficult not to smile.
author: Anushka Sharma

quote: Grit your teeth and smile. In the face of adversity, go. They don't deserve you.
author: Christine Lagarde

quote: As cheesy as it sounds, nothing beats a smile and a bit of confidence! As long as you feel good on the inside, you can still look beautiful without any makeup at all.
author: Zoe Sugg

quote: The pilgrim is humble and devout, and human, and charitable, and ready to smile and admire; therefore, he should comprehend the whole of his way, the people in it, and the hills and the clouds, and the habits of the various cities.
author: Hilaire Belloc

quote: Comrades, this man has a nice smile, but he's got iron teeth.
author: Andrei A. Gromyko

quote: I hoped I could make people smile and laugh and have a good time.
author: Carson Kressley

quote: You get somebody to crack a smile, that's a beautiful thing.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: The last time I saw Ted Kennedy was a generation after my first meeting, at the Senate subway below the Capitol on Obama's Inauguration Day. He was his usual gregarious and gracious self - with beaming smile and booming voice wishing my husband and me good luck with our pregnancy and expressing his excitement about the new president.
author: Christine Pelosi

quote: When we run out of them upstairs, I've been known to appropriate some from our greenroom, pocketing a few with one hand as I smile and greet our guests with the other. One time, Dave Zinczenko of 'Eat this, Not That!' fame, busted me in the act. The cookies apparently fall in the 'not that' category. I made a note of it.
author: Lester Holt

quote: Most babies know how to win us over. We cannot help but smile at them and watch them smile back.
author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quote: It hurts when you have to smile and you don't want to smile, but the best thing to do is to smile.
author: Mary J. Blige

quote: There are just some really beautiful people in the world. When you're walking down the street, or you're at a restaurant, someone catches your eye because they have their own look. It goes way beyond what they're wearing - into their mannerisms, the way they smile, or just the way they hold themselves.
author: Mary-Kate Olsen

quote: For me, relationship is very important. I can lose money, but I cannot lose a relationship. The test is, at the end of a conversation or a negotiation, both must smile.
author: Sunil Mittal

quote: As a former waitress myself, I know firsthand how a simple smile from someone can improve your day and how a single harsh word can destroy it. Being courteous and thoughtful costs you nothing and can sometimes pay you dividends in unexpected ways.
author: Susanna Kearsley

quote: I had the opportunity to go into the hospitals and talk to kids and see a kid and make him smile. Why? Because I'm a special person? No. It had nothing to do with that. It has everything to do with me being the quarterback at the University of Florida. And to not take advantage of that is a shame.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: My new dressing goal is to make little kids and babies smile at all the bright, clashing colours I can wear at once. It makes me laugh when I catch sight of my own reflection - life is too short not have fun!
author: Liz Goldwyn

quote: Nothing can resist the person who smiles at life - I don't mean the ironic and disillusioned smile of my grandfather, but the triumphant smile of the person who knows that he will survive, or that at least he will be saved by what seems to be destroying him.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Every bit of joy in my heart, you know, every smile on my face is yours. It's awesome to be able to share that with somebody.
author: Brantley Gilbert

quote: I still don't love the darkness, though I've learned to smile in it a little bit, now and then.
author: Billy Crystal

quote: I made a circle with a smile for a mouth on yellow paper, because it was sunshiny and bright.
author: Harvey Ball

quote: What looks like enjoyment is the sneer of contempt. That's not a smile.
author: Jack Kevorkian

quote: As long as you smile, have sparkly eyes and stick your shoulders back, nobody's going to notice your bum or your waist or your feet, for that matter.
author: Cat Deeley

quote: When you're walking down the street, or you're at a restaurant, someone catches your eye because they have their own look. It goes way beyond what they're wearing - into their mannerisms, the way they smile, or just the way they hold themselves.
author: Mary-Kate Olsen

quote: Ever since I was four years old, I loved making people smile, making them think, making them feel good, feel some kind of emotion.
author: Ann-Margret

quote: I definitely want to continue working in independent films - and big budget stuff as well - but there's a freedom you have when you're not getting paid. It's easier to say no and there's no pressure to please the powers that be. Also I don't have to hear 'flirt and smile more.'
author: Trieste Kelly Dunn

quote: On 'America's Top Model,' I've always told my girls to smile with their eyes. We call it 'smizing.' Over the years, it's actually become part of pop culture. I would be walking down the street, and girls would say, 'Smize!'
author: Tyra Banks

quote: After my husband John Lennon passed away, I tried to smile for my health.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: For me, fragrances are very - one of these beautiful art forms that bring about a whole host of things. It's what you want to smell like, it's memories that make you smile or are resonant of times in your life, it can remind you of music. If you're a lover of scent, it's a very kind of particular and evocative thing.
author: Chris Pine

quote: God blessed me with two unbelievable parents, and I am just like both of them. I have the smile and charisma of my mother and the big heart of my mom, because she wants to save the world and help the world, so I am just like her.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: It's sort of a feeling of power onstage. It's really the ability to make people smile, or just to turn them one way or another for that duration of time, and for it to have some effect later on. I don't really think it's power... it's the goodness.
author: Robert Plant

quote: I think music, in my opinion, is not about motivation in the way it's - it's not a running base. It's art. And my whole philosophy of music is different. It's almost like cooking and serving to people, seeing them smile and enjoying the food, really.
author: A. R. Rahman

quote: There are certain expectations that are put on you as a child actor, but mainly it's just turn up and say your lines with a lot of energy and a cute smile.
author: Naomie Harris

quote: Don't let people see when you're mad - just smile and laugh.
author: Astro

quote: We should celebrate how amazing our bodies are! We all have things that we like and dislike about our bodies, but we need to focus on what we love - maybe it's a great smile, strong legs or curly hair?
author: Katherine Schwarzenegger

quote: It scares you: all the noise, the rattling, the shaking. But the look on everybody's face when you're finished and packing, it's the best smile in the world; and there's nobody hurt, and the well's under control.
author: Red Adair

quote: Let me smile with the wise, and feed with the rich.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Usually, if you smile at them and show some interest in the toy, they will give it to you. That's a straight up Democrat move!
author: Margaret Cho

quote: I retire with a smile on my face, in good health, and ready to spend autumns at my kids' games instead of my own. I'm excited to start the next chapter of my life.
author: Drew Bledsoe

quote: It is boorish to live ungraciously: the giving is the hardest part what does it cost to add a smile?
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: I have two rules for a great book: make me think and make me smile.
author: Adam Grant

quote: I truly believe my job is to make sure people smile.
author: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: I like to smile. I smile even when I'm nervous since it calms me down and shows my friendliness.
author: Yani Tseng

quote: Joy's smile is much closer to tears than laughter.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: If the Starbucks secret is a smile when you get your latte... ours is that the Web site adapts to the individual's taste.
author: Reed Hastings

quote: To you wives who are constantly complaining and see only the dark side of life, and feel that you are unloved and unwanted, look into your own hearts and minds. If there is something wrong, turn about. Put a smile on your faces. Make yourselves more attractive. Brighten your outlook.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: I wake up every day with a smile on my face.
author: Bob Diamond

quote: A smile is the chosen vehicle of all ambiguities.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Thinking about your training should put a smile on your face. As cliche as it sounds, you are worth all the time and energy you've put in. Unleash your emotions with a cheer, or even a signature roar, after a tough workout.
author: Summer Sanders

quote: We are entertainers. We have to give our audience a good time. If my name serves that purpose, if that brings a smile on your face, then I think it is good and my job has been done.
author: Tiger Shroff

quote: A stale article, if you dip it in a good, warm, sunny smile, will go off better than a fresh one that you've scowled upon.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: If you're able to help some people and make them smile and make them realize that life is good, then that's worth so much more than buying a pair of shoes.
author: Maria Sharapova

quote: I think it's really important that I'm not the only model in the world that goes through personal problems. People forget that we're human. We don't get to call in sick. You have to go and put on a smile. Every single day is a first impression, so you can't have a bummed-out day.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: I'm not the athlete I was when I was training for the Olympics in '92 or when I was working out every single day. I have to live in moderation: I work out three or four days a week, and I smile while I'm working out - I really do enjoy it. I work out with my girlfriends and make it a social competition.
author: Summer Sanders

quote: 'Tis easy enough to be pleasant, When life flows along like a song; But the man worth while is the one who will smile when everything goes dead wrong.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: There are those who believe that the value of a children's book can be measured only in terms of the moral lessons it tries to impose or the perfect role models it offers. Personally, I happen to think that a book is of extraordinary value if it gives the reader nothing more than a smile or two. In fact, I happen to think that's huge.
author: Barbara Park

quote: Acting is a sense of wonder and magic and mystery for me and when life takes me on a new journey, I simply remember the smile my first ballet recital put on my face and I move forward.
author: Andrea Thompson

quote: Mind you, physical training doesn't necessarily mean going to an expert for advice. One doesn't have to make a mountain out of a molehill. Get out in the fresh air and walk briskly - and don't forget to wear a smile while you're at it. Don't over-do. Take it easy at first and build on your effort day by day.
author: Douglas Fairbanks

quote: I don't smile as much as I should, even though I smile inside a lot.
author: James Patterson

quote: Obama's stern demeanor punctuated by intermittent flashes of his wide, relaxing smile is his greatest weapon in defusing pent-up angst.
author: Tina Brown

quote: I get accused of having a haughty smugness. I have a lopsided mouth. I can't help it. I was born with it. It looks as if I am smirking. I have had my publicist tell me, 'Don't do that smile on the red carpet.' I'm, like, 'That's my smile.'
author: Natalie Dormer

quote: Giving back is the right thing to do, whether it's donating clothing or even just a smile to someone who needs it.
author: Becky G

quote: I've just got a really bad smile. I go for the scowl instead.
author: Jason Statham

quote: You learn to laugh at yourself, and you also lean on comedy as a crutch to kind of take the edge off because comedians often are self-deprecating, and they cross lines that they shouldn't. Stuff like that brings a smile to my face every once in a while when needed.
author: John Cena

quote: Have you seen these Japanese hospital droids, or humanoids, or whatever they call it? They've perfected the skin, and the skin looks so real. They have these motors between the eyes for when they smile. It's just mind-blowing.
author: Joel Kinnaman

quote: The man who can smile when things go wrong has thought of someone else he can blame it on.
author: Robert Bloch

quote: A smile abroad is often a scowl at home.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Youth smiles without any reason. It is one of its chiefest charms.
author: Thomas Gray

quote: We sometimes laugh from ear to ear, but it would be impossible for a smile to be wider than the distance between our eyes.
author: Malcolm de Chazal

quote: Right now, I'm following the Buddhist principle: Smile as abuse is hurled your way and this too shall pass.
author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quote: Allowing yourself to smile takes 99% of the effort.
author: Simon Travaglia

quote: But with exquisite breathing you smile, with satisfaction of love, And I touch you again as you tick in the silence and settle in sleep.
author: Karl Shapiro

quote: Some people know that they are so adorable looking, all they have to do is smile and dress up and they get plenty from that. Then there are some of us who, early on, see that that doesn't work. So we joke about it.
author: Merrill Markoe

quote: If you want to meet a woman, it's best just to smile and say hi.
author: Karen McDougal

quote: Laughter is regional: a smile extends over the whole face.
author: Malcolm de Chazal

quote: I'm as happy a man as any in the world, for the whole world seems to smile upon me!
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: There is not a soul who does not have to beg alms of another, either a smile, a handshake, or a fond eye.
author: Lord Acton

quote: People always say golfers don't smile. But there is so much psychology in golf so we have to be a bit robotic.
author: Lee Westwood

quote: I just want to make people smile.
author: Julie Garwood

quote: If you force yourself to smile, within a couple minutes, you feel happy.
author: Dean Norris

quote: Just because a situation is grim doesn't mean you don't have every right to smile.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: I always said that if I could just find a guy who could chop wood and had a nice smile, it wouldn't bother me if he was a thug or an aristocrat, as long as he was a good guy. And I've ended up with an educated thug.
author: Sade Adu

quote: If I'm a bad mood, I can't go on stage and smile.
author: Grimes

quote: There is no greater feeling in business than building a product which impacts people's lives in a profound way. When we look around at the thousands of people who have attended Summit gatherings, it makes us smile to see the new friendships, business partnerships and philanthropic initiatives that each event produces.
author: Elliott Bisnow

quote: Sometimes you say things with a smile with the precise intention of making it clear that you are not being serious, and are only kidding. If I salute a friend with a smile and say, 'How are you, you old scoundrel!' clearly I don't really mean he's a scoundrel.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: I think a smile can make your whole body. Models, they look fabulous, but they don't smile, and they look so mad.
author: Serena Williams

quote: If women had to promise to provide for a man for a lifetime before he removed his veil and showed her his smile, would we think of this as a system of female privilege?
author: Warren Farrell

quote: I am generally a very happy and easygoing person. I also believe it's always better to meet people with a smile rather than looking cold, especially when you first meet. It changes everything.
author: Heidi Klum

quote: I try to keep people happy. I go out of my way to get a smile. That's the way my mother raised me.
author: Donald Dunn

quote: I eat every two hours. I sleep for eight hours. I have lots of water. I pray to keep calm. Most importantly, I have a smile on my face.
author: Vidya Balan

quote: Even a smile is a good deed.
author: Shari Arison

quote: There's nothing like seeing the smile on my kids' faces. Laughing together. Playing. It's the best.
author: Mark Wahlberg

quote: As a female, you are often being asked by directors to be warmer, softer, flirt more, smile more etc... None of those things are bad, and obviously we are capable of a variety of human behavior, but it gets really old having to play into somebody's stereotype or ideal.
author: Trieste Kelly Dunn

quote: If you cannot smile when you listen to music, then do not listen to it!
author: Estelle

quote: More people smile at me now I'm richer.
author: Mo Ibrahim

quote: Once you don't smile on film, they say, 'Let's have that bloke who doesn't smile.'
author: Richard C. Armitage

quote: Y'know, smile, dance, get crazy... we sure do while we're making it, because music is our leeezshure; it's my fun.
author: Bernard Edwards

quote: No matter what I put out, somebody will be offended. I made a video on 10 reasons to smile, and it has dislikes. That should be an indication that there will be some who get offended no matter what you do. The best you can do as an entertainer or as someone who performs is to follow what you believe in.
author: Lilly Singh

quote: 'Chef' is a dish of arroz con pollo served with a smile but not much style. The critic in the film would give it a low grade, for agreeability without ambition.
author: Richard Corliss

quote: Not everything is going to be handed to you just because you're talented with a big smile. Sometimes you just gotta get out and shoot jumpers for hours and hours and hours. That's something I didn't really get a grasp on until way later, waking up early and treating it like a job if you're serious about it. Get the freak up and, you know, work.
author: Anderson Paak

quote: People want to start their day off with a smile or, better yet, a guffaw.
author: George Takei

quote: Pictorial is something that I am not used to. You have to pose, smile, bend your arm, straighten up, look to the left.
author: Benigno Aquino III

quote: When onstage, I always try to take my audience through as many emotions as I possibly can. I want them to go from laughter to tears, be shocked and surprised and walk out the door with a renewed sense of themselves - and maybe a smile.
author: Reba McEntire

quote: No, I like to wear as least amount of makeup as I can during my everyday life because I'm just all about keeping my skin healthy and hydrated and I love to laugh and have a great time and smile - that's when I feel the most pretty so I just want to make sure that I stay happy.
author: Lily Collins

quote: Smiles come naturally to me, but I started thinking of them as an art form at my command. I studied all the time. I looked at magazines, I'd practice in front of the mirror and I'd ask photographers about the best angles. I can now pull out a smile at will.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: If what I have to do is share a sandwich to lift someone's spirits, put a smile on their face - the worst thing that happens is I go broke!
author: Jose Andres

quote: I am so happy to be alive. That's the one thing I'd like for people to know. Sometimes people walk by and slip up and say the wrong thing about me, and I'll smile. They wonder why am I smiling. Because I'm happy that I'm alive.
author: George Foreman

quote: When I take my kids out for dinner or lunch, people smile at us.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: I come from a place where everything about me, even my body language, is saying: I mean you no harm. I smile, I laugh. Basic stuff for most people.
author: Oscar Isaac

quote: Advice from my experience, for me, I've never taken no as an answer, I don't believe in that. If I want something, I'm going to get it. When people tell me that I can't do something, it just motivates me more. For me, it makes me smile, because I just want to prove everybody wrong.
author: Roman Reigns

quote: I've had more ups than downs in my career. All you can do is keep working. You still have to take enjoyment out of what you're doing, and things will turn, and my smile has always been there. In good moments and bad.
author: Eden Hazard

quote: There are so many beautiful things that are a part of the world, and I've always looked at life that way; I've always tried to put on a smile and a brave front, not just for my kids but in my own life and all the difficulties that I've gone through.
author: Gloria Estefan

quote: Everything about 'UY' is new and fresh, and we are extremely happy at the response from the audiences, as most people are walking out of cinema halls with a smile on their faces.
author: Akkineni Nagarjuna

quote: If you walk down the street and smile at someone, that will get passed on to the next person. That has the power to change someone's day.
author: Julianna Margulies

quote: With my father and sister being very depressed for most of their lives, it was incumbent on me to try to make them laugh, in this ridiculous way. They were the wittiest people I knew, but to get a smile from them was like winning the lottery.
author: Miriam Toews

quote: It's important to maintain an attractive smile as you age. A lighter, less beige, more white tooth color is key, but no Chiclets.
author: Evelyn Lauder

quote: The smile of God is victory.
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: Reproof on her lip, but a smile in her eye.
author: Samuel Lover

quote: Generally, when a record label suggests album ideas for you, you smile politely, and then proceed to shoot it down, because it's never what you as an artist feel is right for you.
author: John Scofield

quote: When you walk into a room, a healthy, beautiful smile is incredibly important.
author: Susan Anton

quote: When I see myself on film it makes me smile, I mean making a good living doing what I enjoy is soo much fun. I just hope that everyone has the chance to enjoy life like I do.
author: Adrienne Barbeau

quote: Go, forget me - why should sorrow, O'er that brow a shadow fling? Go, forget me - and tomorrow, brightly smile and sweetly sing. Smile - though I shall not be near thee; Sing - though I shall never hear thee.
author: Charles Wolfe

quote: We ought to be beating our chests every day. We ought to look in the mirror, stick out our chests, suck in our bellies, and say, 'Damn, we're Americans,' and smile.
author: Jay Garner

quote: The truth is that when Lennon is Bosephus, she is so mean to me. She can't smile because the mustache will come off. So in between takes, it's just scowling. And then when we are on camera, Bosephus treats me like a piece of meat. I'm repulsed and also attracted to it.
author: Jessica St. Clair

quote: Sometimes people have questioned whether I was making fun of the industry or just at myself. I'm just trying to raise a smile. Clothes aren't meant to be worshipped at a church altar.
author: Jeremy Scott

quote: At one time, you could sit on the Rue de la Paix in Paris or at the Habima Theater in Tel Aviv or in Medina and you could see a person come in, black, white, it didn't matter. You said, 'That's an American' because there's a readiness to smile and to talk to people.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: 'SMiLE' is perhaps the Beach Boys' most legendary album. It was recorded in 1966 and 1967 but only saw a formal release in 2011. That's a long time to wait for what was said to be Brian Wilson's masterpiece.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: A bland smile is like a green light at an intersection, it feels good when you get one, but you forget it the moment you're past it.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: We've all met those who seem to radiate happiness. They seem to smile more than others they laugh more than others - just being around them makes us happier as well.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: Jesus wept Voltaire smiled. From that divine tear and from that human smile is derived the grace of present civilization.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: I've learned to lose with a smile on my face. That's what the Oscar teaches you.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: I'm not this callous clown walking around laughing at life all the time. I've had some serious, serious problems in my life. But I've come out with a smile.
author: John Lydon

quote: So, my style has hopefully changed over the years and it is more relaxed, and I do tend to smile and have more than one expression these days hopefully - which I didn't at the beginning.
author: Jo Brand

quote: Sometimes when I'm being photographed, I hear the voice of this photographer who told me when I was about six while he was taking my school photo that I didn't have a nice smile, and I shouldn't smile in photos.
author: Brad Goreski

quote: I've told several writers this, and, again, I get back to it, but if you want to make God smile, tell him your plans.
author: Vin Scully

quote: I would try to promote something that I loved, and the entire interview would be about my personal life. I would leave a room feeling defeated, feeling embarrassed, but I would always make sure to put that smile on my face because I wasn't going to let them get to me.
author: Selena Gomez

quote: I'm so envious of that genetic wiring that immediately puts a smile on your face. My genetic wiring just puts creases in my eyebrows.
author: Chris Pine

quote: City Ballet has to develop choreographers of stature and a new approach to coaching before everything we value about it fades away and, in the great tradition of the Cheshire Cat, there's nothing left but Peter Martins' smile.
author: Robert Gottlieb

quote: I was talking to a guy who was holding his 18-month-old daughter with the only limb he had left, and he had a smile on his face. I thought, 'I'm not even a 10th of this man.'
author: Ron White

quote: I have witnessed the softening of the hardest of hearts by a simple smile.
author: Goldie Hawn

quote: A body smiles, like, 72 times a day. Where does that smile go? That's what I want to know.
author: Goldie Hawn

quote: In general, men are wired to notice obvious signs that convey interest in mating - a warm smile, for example - and ignore other subtleties, like if your lipstick is faded.
author: Helen Fisher

quote: It's true that a smile can take years off a person - not that such a thing matters in Yoko Ono's case.
author: Elvis Mitchell

quote: My children and my husband make me smile. My work makes me smile.
author: Victoria Beckham

quote: I loved the Kennedy Center Honors because you just sit there, smile, wave, and cry.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Let him who expects one class of society to prosper in the highest degree, while the other is in distress, try whether one side; of the face can smile while the other is pinched.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Of course I used to smile and laugh in 1976, but not when I was competing. Please show me somebody who laughs when they are concentrating; I always smiled.
author: Nadia Comaneci

quote: I'm a happy guy. I just want to see people laugh and smile.
author: Gerry Cooney

quote: I don't smile a lot in my pictures. I'm always so... grim.
author: Michael Douglas

quote: I am so saddened and grossed out by young women who look like creepy, old aliens because of their new Barbie noses and lips. Is that a smile or a grimace?
author: Olivia Wilde

quote: There's an old adage about speakers: You won't remember what they said, but you'll never forget how they made you feel. Trump knows that in his bones. He gives his supporters - and they are growing - a terrific feeling of safety and security, along with a laugh and a smile.
author: Cass Sunstein

quote: I never realized before this the emotional power of some really simple, corny tropes: people with top hats, people with batons, confetti going off, how important it is to smile.
author: Ira Glass

quote: I hated the ballet, but I liked performing. I did 20 shows, and I couldn't get the smile off my face.
author: Ansel Elgort

quote: The very best hotel I've stayed in is the Intercontinental on Park Lane. We went there for the Chelsea Flower Show a few years ago, and it was sheer luxury. Everybody had a smile on their face. I came home and changed all my pillows because the hotel ones were so beautiful.
author: Mary Berry

quote: Comedians like to see people smile. With acting, I love giving people a feeling, an emotion. I like to give people a feeling. When they come away from my scene, I want them to think.
author: Keke Palmer

quote: I feel like looking in the mirror when you brush your teeth, yes, I see lines, and then I smile and I see things here and there. But that's just, you know, you - that's your journey, you know?
author: Heidi Klum

quote: When I came into office, people said, 'Billionaire? How do they live? What do they eat? How do they sleep?' Today, they see me on the subway coming uptown. A couple of people say hi, some people smile and nod. Some people just sleep. It's not an issue.
author: Michael Bloomberg

quote: I've been dealing with the press for 45 years. You need a very long spoon to sup with them. While you are always grateful, they are like badly trained dogs. They smile and wag and bite your arm off.
author: Joanna Lumley

quote: Our aim is to develop affectionate robots that can make people smile.
author: Masayoshi Son

quote: I have a few go-to moves like jazz hands, shake the booty, stupid eyes. It was once a mating ritual, but now it's all about looking silly and making the kids smile.
author: John Cho

quote: Actors are supposed to be these runaways that get in a covered wagon filled with hats and tambourines and go from town to town making people smile.
author: John Cho

quote: I'm all about people that appreciate, that are grateful, that smile, that have a sense of humour - the dirtier the laugh, the better- that's my kind of vibe... and I hope that's the kind of thing that I attract.
author: Poppy Delevingne

quote: As a New Yorker, this is what you do: you confront, jab, and slap, sometimes wrongly, then smile and forget about it.
author: Greg Gutfeld

quote: I always remember this neighbor who would ask me to babysit for her. She looked like Jayne Mansfield, and I remember babysitting for, like, five hours and she would pay me 80 cents, with a phony smile. I used to go home fuming to my mum.
author: Jennifer Coolidge

quote: When men have a smile on their faces, that does a lot for me.
author: Michelle Yeoh

quote: If you can't relax during your interview, then nothing you do to prepare will matter. Being yourself is essential to the selection process, and interviewers will feel it if you're too nervous. Showing fear or anxiety appears weak compared to a relaxed smile and genuine confidence.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: When I'm getting a chance to do my job or make somebody's day, and be on stage where I love, and see all the fans having fun, you can't help but smile.
author: Cole Swindell

quote: I am happy at Tottenham. I go into work every day with a smile on my face, and that is important.
author: Harry Kane

quote: I have a great smile. A lot of people don't know that.
author: Draymond Green

quote: Scarlett Johansson has a smile she tries to suppress in every movie she makes. She's been trying to keep a straight face since she appeared with Bill Murray 11 years ago in her breakthrough, 'Lost in Translation.'
author: Steve Erickson

quote: On the red carpet, one tip is to suck in your cheekbones - apparently it looks better on camera. I don't know, though; I think a nice smile is best.
author: David Harewood

quote: Some people are fighting much, much more important battles and much bigger battles, and if we get the chance to put a smile on their face for ten seconds, it's so worth it.
author: Dolph Ziggler

quote: I live to leave somebody with a positive experience when they've met me, and make someone smile for the day.
author: Dolph Ziggler

quote: Make people have a smile when they finish your e-mail.
author: Letitia Baldrige

quote: I'm honest and tell it like it is. I've been around the horn a few times and learned valuable lessons from screwing up a bit. So, if I can pass off advice or make someone smile on the way to work, I'm for it.
author: Stone Cold Steve Austin

quote: No connection to the average voter - Clinton has an air of superiority. Despite her wide smile and pleasant appearance, she is envisioned as someone who is trying to hide something all the time.
author: Fabrizio Moreira

quote: The NBA Schedule was made up by one man, Eddie Gottlieb, who had owned the Philadelphia Warriors. Eddie had a Buddha-like body and a crinkly smile, and because he had also been an owner in baseball's old Negro leagues, he was known as the Mogul.
author: Frank Deford

quote: Tears are sometimes an inappropriate response to death. When a life has been lived completely honestly, completely successfully, or just completely, the correct response to death's perfect punctuation mark is a smile.
author: Julie Burchill

quote: I will tell you with 100 percent confidence, Jon Jones is not deep in my head. The fact he actually thinks that, it makes me smile every day.
author: Daniel Cormier

quote: Every now and then, someone will tell me that one of my books has made them laugh out loud. I never believe them because: a.) my books don't make me laugh out loud; and b.) sometimes I have said this to a writer, when really what I meant was, 'Your book made me smile appreciatively.'
author: Mary Roach

quote: If you're in my shoes, and your goal is to leave people with the biggest possible smile on their face, then doing the meet-and-greet afterwards makes sense.
author: Mick Foley

quote: Kanye is so much fun. He's a wonderful person. What I love about Kim and Kanye is that I think they save their happy moments and their smiles for themselves rather than sharing everything with the public. And listen, when a camera is shoved in your face trying to take a selfie, you do not want to smile.
author: Chrissy Teigen

quote: As a model, I really stand for not being a model, if that makes sense. When I started, the whole idea of the model was very different; it was a bit stuck-up. Not stuck-up, but no one was trying to have fun, or not even have fun, but be willing to smile.
author: Cara Delevingne

quote: I cry at anything remotely touching - smile at me warmly and I'm off... television also does it, everything from 'X-Factor' to cereal commercials. I cry when I am tired. I also cry when I laugh.
author: Natalie Massenet

quote: I guess the news is this: If you're a Republican and you smile, liberals don't like it. Maybe that's because Democrats are afraid that I've been able to show an optimistic vision for this country.
author: Cory Gardner

quote: I'm a workhorse. I'll take anything and everything I can get, and I'll do it with a smile on my face.
author: Roman Reigns

quote: As I get older, I want to do more films for kids because they're the best audience around. Just putting a smile on a kid's face is the best thing.
author: James McAvoy

quote: Later in my life, I'm going to look back and smile and be very fulfilled. I know that if I don't give it my all right now I'll regret it later. That's very important to me, because I've worked all my life to have this.
author: Shania Twain

quote: Clinton's hands remain incredibly clean, don't they, and Tony Blair's smile remains as wide as ever. I view these guises with profound contempt.
author: Harold Pinter

quote: I get really frustrated if people don't smile.
author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

quote: Religion can emerge in all forms of feeling: here wild anger, there the sweetest pain; here consuming hatred, there the childlike smile of serene humility.
author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: I could be hit by a Sara Lee truck tomorrow. Which is not a bad way of going: 'Richard Simmons Found in a Freeway in Pound Cake and Fudge, With a Smile on His Face.' Let's face it. We don't know anything.
author: Richard Simmons

quote: I will have my publicist pull pictures of the way I look at events so I can see, 'Oh, that cut is not as flattering as I thought,' or 'I should smile bigger,' or 'That positioning is odd.' I learn from it.
author: Allison Williams

quote: I think Led Zeppelin must have worn some of the most peculiar clothing that men had ever been seen to wear without cracking a smile.
author: Robert Plant

quote: You know when someone's over-flattering you in a way. You smile but you can't believe it.
author: Laura Linney

quote: I wish to be appreciated not only as a film star but also for the person I am. If I manage to bring a smile on people's faces, then I think I'll be successful.
author: Deepika Padukone

quote: If you're authentic, people smile because they sense there's a piece of themselves there.
author: Bonnie Hunt

quote: My smile will always be broken, but I'll always be grateful for the chance to get to do what I get to do.
author: Trent Franks

quote: Somebody said to me, 'Whenever somebody says your name, a smile comes to their face.' That's a great accolade. I strive to keep it that way.
author: Clarence Clemons

quote: My theory is, if you force yourself to smile enough, then you start to feel it. Which comes in handy all the time.
author: Erika Christensen

quote: Playing hard to get is not the way to win me over. I'm definitely more for the girl who can smile and laugh all the time and just have a good time!
author: Taylor Lautner

quote: Julia Roberts taught me how to knit on the set of 'Mona Lisa Smile.'
author: Julia Stiles

quote: I was walking around legally blind. Now I have 20-20 vision. I can't believe I spent so many years blurry, but I think that coincides with how I was feeling. Now I notice if people are watching me, but I also smile right back if someone waves, which helps.
author: Nicole Kidman

quote: I have always been a flirt. My mother says whe I was a child, I used to stand outside the house and just smile at everyone who walked by. Like, 'Please take me with you!'
author: bell hooks

quote: I just feel like people like a little break. Especially at 12:37 at night, you go, like, 'I'm just tired of the snarky right now. I just want to lie down and have somebody make me laugh for an hour. Entertain me, and then I'm going to sleep with a smile on my face.' That's my job; that's what I do.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: The coolest part about seeing a girl wear something comfortable is the smile that you can just feel coming through from inside her.
author: Kellan Lutz

quote: The 'good' mother, with her fixed smile, her rigidity, her goody-goody outlook, her obsession with unnecessary hygiene, is in fact a fool. It is the 'bad' mother, unafraid of a joke and a glass of wine, richly self-expressive, scornful of suburban values, who is, in reality, good.
author: Rachel Cusk

quote: I thought, 'It doesn't matter what that woman is wearing,' but then I realised actually it's our job as designers to make women smile; to bring them the chocolate without the calories.
author: Alber Elbaz

quote: For me, music makes my smile brighter during my workouts. It adds that extra something that motivates me to go further or work harder!
author: Summer Sanders

quote: We've been trained since kindergarten: Be nice, be kind, share, put on a smile. So we're conditioned to squash our natural selfish instincts, and that's the right thing for society.
author: Bryan Cranston

quote: I used to watch some of the reality shows about models, and then, weirdly, now I try to incorporate into my fashion shoots the skills I learnt from watching those shows. It's like, thanks Tyra, 'cause you've given me, like, all the cool tips. Like how to smile with your eyes.
author: Rebel Wilson

quote: You know, there's nothing like seeing the smile on my kids' faces. Laughing together. Playing. It's the best.
author: Mark Wahlberg

quote: I am trying to inspire people to just take control of their oral health, because if we don't take care of our oral health, it affects so many different aspects of our lives. If your smile and mouth is not together, it affects your relationship, your self-esteem, your health.
author: Sherri Shepherd

quote: I played the violin my whole life. I wanted to play from the time I was just a little kid, and I've always loved dance as well. I wanted to make people smile. I wanted to add an extra energy to my playing and make it visual and make it unique and fun.
author: Lindsey Stirling

quote: It's really hard to smile when you play. As a performer, if I ever find myself focusing, it's like, 'Oh no - orchestra face!' It's not attractive at all, so I have to focus on smiling.
author: Lindsey Stirling

quote: While journalists cannot right every wrong, champion every cause or fix every problem, they can - through the written word - lift someone's burden for a day, make some elderly woman on a bus smile or let them know they are noticed by someone.
author: Regina Brett

quote: Sometimes Queens' music is dark, but somehow it's ok to deliver it with a smile on your face because thing's are still going to kick in.
author: Josh Homme

quote: Riding Valegro always makes you smile, so I enjoy it.
author: Charlotte Dujardin

quote: I can't help but smile when I ride Valegro; I think something, and he does it. I laugh, and I think, 'God, how does he know? I didn't even ask. I just thought it.'
author: Charlotte Dujardin

quote: It is spectacular. From about five minutes in, when we knew for sure that we were going to have the weather to go, the smile on my face just got bigger and bigger, and I was just beaming through the whole launch. I mean, it is just an amazing ride.
author: Chris Hadfield

quote: My mother-in-law speaks not a word of English. I speak not a word of Tajiki. So I smile at her ingratiatingly and she fixes me with a beady eye.
author: Wilbur Smith

quote: 'Priced to sell' - just the phrase makes me smile. When a dealer says all the items in his booth are priced to sell, he means he's tagged them as aggressively as he can to get you to buy them. Don't worry, though, I still haggle. You have to. That's the point of a flea market.
author: Nate Berkus

quote: I was never one of those surly teenagers who doesn't smile. My lovely godfather said it was always lovely to see me because I was the only teenager who smiled. And I was so in awe of him, I thought it was one of the best things anyone had ever said to me. So it made me want to live up to what he said.
author: Olivia Colman

quote: In politics you learn to always smile.
author: Eliot Spitzer

quote: I've been successful in different areas, but nothing brings a smile to my face more than my oldest son, Zaire, and my second son, Zion, saying the kind word of 'Dad.'
author: Dwyane Wade

quote: Young women from a very young age are taught that life will be easier if you can just turn on the charming smile and say very little and be complacent and docile and sweet.
author: Amber Heard

quote: I love Jesus Christ with all my heart and everything He stands for. I think that sums up everything that I want for my life, everything I want for my family, everything I want for my career. I want it to be entertaining. I want people to smile and tap their toes, but I want it to be meaningful when the day is done.
author: Josh Turner

quote: I'm quite British in the sense of not expressing my emotions much. I save it for my songs. If you ask about a death in the family, or a lover, I will not be emotional. I'd probably answer with a smile. Because that's what we British blokes do.
author: James Blunt

quote: I have learned to smile when I wasn't happy, to sing when I didn't feel like it, and to do things just to please my fans.
author: Tionne Watkins

quote: People relate to me, and I try to make songs that make people smile.
author: Olly Murs

quote: When I hear theists and atheists pontificating on how they know God does or does not exist, I can only smile at the irrationality and, yes, vanity of the notion.
author: Vincent Bugliosi

quote: The Oscars are a lot different when you are a nominee. You walk around with this big smile on your face, and everyone, even people who work for rival film companies, tells you they voted for you.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: A man can be drawn across the room with the simplicity of a smile. That's why your pearly whites should always be straight and shiny. I think most of my clients are drawn to a fun, flirty nature in a woman. The problem is, most women do not often feel fun and flirty.
author: Patti Stanger

quote: If I went to them all dressed up and flashed a nice smile for the cameras it would probably be easier for me to get work. But I just can't tolerate it.
author: Charlie Hunnam

quote: I'm always trying to make myself laugh. I'm the most enthusiastic audience I'm likely to find, so if it doesn't make me smile then it probably won't work on you. The jokes that only make me shrug get cut.
author: Victor LaValle

quote: You can always tell folks from nonfolks. Folks like to feel good, like to smile for the camera when there's a big photo opportunity for a really good cause.
author: Russell Baker

quote: I wish I was told to look after my teeth when I was younger. My smile is really important to me and one of my biggest assets, so I'm very conscious that I need to keep it in top condition.
author: Louise Nurding

quote: I'm a fun song maker. I love to make people smile. I also love to see them big, burly dudes crying because their wives' song is 'Die a Happy Man.'
author: Thomas Rhett

quote: I think one of my first jokes - in the black community, there's people who have jokes about skin tone. People like, 'You so black, you purple.' 'You so black, you gotta smile so we can see you at night.'
author: Hannibal Buress

quote: Crowds are the most difficult thing for me these days because I have to walk with my head down and my eyes averted. There's still that part of me that wants to hold my head up, make eye contact and smile.
author: Cameron Diaz

quote: I suffered from post-natal depression after Rowan was born. I had a healthy, beautiful baby girl and I couldn't look at her. I couldn't hold her, smile at her. All I wanted was to disappear and die.
author: Brooke Shields

quote: Country music in the mid-'90s was a big influence on my career, and I played all the songs that are referenced in '94' back in my club days. Joe Diffie was rocking a sick mullet, and he was hotter than ever... just putting out monster hit after monster hit. It totally takes me back to those days, and it makes me smile every time I hear it.
author: Jason Aldean

quote: When you have to work, work with a smile.
author: Kapil Dev

quote: I like to post positive content, and I like to try and make people smile. That's why those videos are popular. I don't fake it.
author: Cameron Dallas

quote: Ostensibly rigorous and realistic, contemporary conservatism is an ideology of denial. Its symbol is a smile button.
author: Christopher Lasch

quote: I bring people on stage with me. It's a good time, and people love to join in on the party. Show me a smile, and I'll show you one back.
author: Vanilla Ice

quote: After six years without seeing one, I love just seeing a smile - every smile I see gives me hope.
author: Ingrid Betancourt

quote: It's a blessing because the Baldwin vibe on the street is what I live for the most. I think our name is something that a lot of people get a good feeling about and brings a smile to their face, and we're very fortunate.
author: Stephen Baldwin

quote: Bob Dylan has always sealed his decisions with the unexplainable. His motives for withholding the release of the magnificent 'Basement Tapes' will be as forever obscure as Brian Wilson's reasons for the destruction of the tapes for 'Smile.'
author: Jon Landau

quote: I have always loved a hard-faced girl. I get that Alison Goldfrapp isn't easy, and I like her belligerence. She's deeply sexy and controlled, like a Strict Machine, and it seems to wind the b'jesus out of the women I know. On the outside, I watch and smile and will her on like a twisted silent maiden aunt in the dark corner.
author: Alison Moyet

quote: I had ordered long legs, but they never arrived. My eyes are weird too, one is gray and the other is green. I have a crooked smile and my nose looks like a ski slope. No, I would not win a Miss contest.
author: Jane Seymour

quote: I have had wrinkles on my forehead and my smile line since I was a kid. I see them in my own kids. I know what they're going to look like. So it's kind of like that's my personality. I feel the older you get, too, the more confident you become just in your own skin.
author: Faith Hill

quote: I just want to show the fans my big smile and play the game that I love.
author: Yani Tseng

quote: Anyone who's ever driven to Atlantic City knows that Trump's got a big billboard. For years, you used to see his angry face on it. I said, 'Trump, that expression is making people afraid to go to the Taj Mahal. Why don't you give them a big smile.? 'C'mon in, folks! Spend your money here!' I think we got that corrected.
author: Regis Philbin

quote: Red carpets seem so glamorous, but you're really just standing there sweating and worrying your hair is going to fall. And in the end, people are only going to see one picture of you. You just smile for one second and then you walk over to the side and check your phone. It's pretty weird.
author: Morgan Saylor

quote: Jessica Simpson is the youth ambassador for Operation Smile, and an episode of The Apprentice featured a team managing a charity concert she put on. Donald Trump came on stage and pledged a donation.
author: Roma Downey

quote: I think Operation Smile is in more than 22 countries, mostly Third World. It just happened that my schedule opened up at the time they were heading to Vietnam.
author: Roma Downey

quote: A smile costs about $240.
author: Roma Downey

quote: In Delhi, where I grew up, commerce is brusque. You don't ask each other how your day has been. You might not even smile. I'm not saying this is ideal - it's how it is. You're tied together by a transaction. The customer doesn't tremble before complaining about how cold his food is.
author: Karan Mahajan

quote: If I am not mistaken, it was a British poet who said that 'no one is properly dressed unless he wears a smile.'
author: Sukarno

quote: I've never liked my smile, you see. I should have had braces as a kid, but I was too proud and too vain. And I didn't want to be bullied at school.
author: Ricky Whittle

quote: I'm a huge sun baby. As soon as the sun comes out, my smile gets bigger, so I'm constantly smiling in L.A. It's a fantastic place to be.
author: Ricky Whittle

quote: People need to understand that the Lauryn Hill they were exposed to in the beginning was all that was allowed in that arena at the time. I had to step away for the sake of the machine. I was being way too compromised. I felt uncomfortable having to smile in someone's face when I really didn't like them or know them well enough to like.
author: Lauryn Hill

quote: It's very strange to go to cities like London and New York. People walk so quickly, they seem to be in a hurry all the time. And you don't say 'Hi' to everyone you meet, and you don't smile to everyone you meet, because there's just so many. Which is also very strange.
author: Aurora
