quote: People want more and more leisure time, which means the freedom to do what they want to do, not what they have to do, and as we get richer and richer, more and more people will be able to afford that.
author: Robert Fogel

quote: Freedom is a struggle, and we do it together. Not only together as black citizens, but black and white together.
author: Andrew Young

quote: The notion that the species can be improved in some way, that everyone could live in harmony, is a really dangerous idea. Those who are afflicted with this notion are the first ones to give up their souls, their freedom. Your desire that it be that way will enslave you and make your life vacuous.
author: Cormac McCarthy

quote: I have a very personal feeling about how special America is, and I know how precious freedom is. It is a sacred gift, sanctified by those who have lived it and those who have died defending it. My right to speak my mind, to have a voice, to be what some have called 'opinionated,' is a right I deeply and profoundly cherish.
author: Teresa Heinz

quote: At least in America, you have freedom of speech, which is a good thing. It's just a question of whether you're allowed to use it on 'Fox News'.
author: Eric Idle

quote: The Founding Fathers are not just some people that happened to get mad a long time ago and want their freedom. They were special people in addition to what their natural yearnings were.
author: Rush Limbaugh

quote: The battle for freedom and liberty really never is over, and there are really low points in it, but I'm not giving up, and I'm not gonna engage in phony pep talks, either.
author: Rush Limbaugh

quote: I used to be a freelance journalist, so I had to write fast, but I always found writing nonfiction constraining. I like the freedom of fiction, where I get to invent everything, and tidy, conclusive endings are within my control.
author: Michelle Gagnon

quote: My only writing ritual is to shave my head bald between writing the first and second drafts of a book. If I can throw away all my hair, then I have the freedom to trash any part of the book on the next rewrite.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Any people anywhere, being inclined and having the power, have the right to rise up, and shake off the existing government, and form a new one that suits them better. This is a most valuable - a most sacred right - a right, which we hope and believe, is to liberate the world.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Violent means will give violent freedom. That would be a menace to the world and to India herself.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Freedom means the right of people to assemble, organize, and debate openly.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: Order without liberty and liberty without order are equally destructive.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: It seems that the right of freedom of speech that was enshrined in numerous constitutions is now under attack by religious institutions.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: If terrorism is to be defeated, the world of Islam must take on board the secularist-humanist principles on which the modern is based, and without which Muslim countries' freedom will remain a distant dream.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: All theory is against freedom of the will all experience for it.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Freedom is a man's natural power of doing what he pleases, so far as he is not prevented by force or law.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: I'm not afraid of terrorism at all. I'm afraid of loss of our freedom, loss of mobility, loss of global comradeship.
author: Patti Smith

quote: For in the end, freedom is a personal and lonely battle; and one faces down fears of today so that those of tomorrow might be engaged.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Not to sound overly cheesy but I really appreciate the freedom we have in America - especially as a female.
author: Katy Perry

quote: In the Bible, God offered the Pharaoh freedom if he would just let the oppressed people free to go to the land of milk and honey. But the Pharaoh disobeyed, and he was destroyed.
author: Malcolm X

quote: The more liberty you give away the more you will have.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Freedom without limits is just a word.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: My children came out as individuals in their own right. They were not my products. They had their own characters and were very strong-minded. I gave them a lot of freedom when they were still very young. The one thing they got from me is morals. They would never betray anyone. They are really good people.
author: Vivienne Westwood

quote: If social stability goes pear-shaped, you have a choice between anarchy and dictatorship. Most people will opt for more security, even if they have to give up some personal freedom.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: You can't put democracy and freedom back into a box.
author: George W. Bush

quote: You have the freedom to live and let live, to love and let love. Granting yourself that freedom is one of the healthiest, most constructive things you can do for yourself and the people who matter to you.
author: Martha Beck

quote: We can't equate democracy with Christianity because the largest democracy on earth is India, which is primarily Hindu. The third largest democracy is Indonesia, which is Islamic. Democracy and freedom are not dependent on Christian beliefs.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: I don't believe in firing professors. They have academic freedom.
author: Alan Dershowitz

quote: I love to deer hunt and fish and drive down the back roads in my truck. All those things basically equal freedom to me - and not having to return that message or call from my record company or management. At some point, I need to recharge.
author: Blake Shelton

quote: But it wasn't until I graduated from Texas A & M University and joined the United States Air Force, flying C-130's all around the globe, that I truly appreciated the blessings of freedom.
author: Rick Perry

quote: But I found that disappointing people is a good thing, because disapproval is freedom.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: The greatest threat to freedom is the absence of criticism.
author: Wole Soyinka

quote: I needed freedom to really express myself. That's really what Justified is about.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: Freedom is secured every day by our men and women in uniform. We must build a future worthy of their sacrifice.
author: Nancy Pelosi

quote: Freedom is not won by merely overthrowing a tyrannical ruler or an oppressive regime. That is usually only the prelude to a new tyranny, a new oppression.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: Freedom is control in your own life.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: Liberty is worth paying for.
author: Jules Verne

quote: A hungry man is not a free man.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: That's free enterprise, friends: freedom to gamble, freedom to lose. And the great thing - the truly democratic thing about it - is that you don't even have to be a player to lose.
author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quote: The United States is a giant island of freedom, achievement, wealth and prosperity in a world hostile to our values.
author: Phyllis Schlafly

quote: Freedom is the only law which genius knows.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: When more Americans prefer freebies to freedom, these great United States will become a fertile ground for tyranny.
author: Allen West

quote: Freedom and justice cannot be parceled out in pieces to suit political convenience. I don't believe you can stand for freedom for one group of people and deny it to others.
author: Coretta Scott King

quote: You learn that you either are going to have a police state where you don't have any freedom left, or you're going to build a world that doesn't create terrorists - and that means a whole different way of 'getting along.'
author: John Shelby Spong

quote: We're giving our freedoms away. The American experiment was about freedom. Freedom to be stupid, freedom to fail, freedom to succeed.
author: Glenn Beck

quote: I want to give myself the freedom not to have to be projecting my whole life ahead.
author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quote: Analysis gave me great freedom of emotions and fantastic confidence. I felt I had served my time as a puppet.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: One man's blasphemy doesn't override other people's free-speech rights, their freedom to publish, freedom of thought.
author: Dan Savage

quote: I've learned over the years that freedom is just the other side of discipline.
author: Jake Gyllenhaal

quote: Just as the Security Council was largely irrelevant to the great struggle of the last half of the twentieth century - freedom against Communism - so too it is largely on the sidelines in our contemporary struggles against international terrorism and the proliferation of weapons of mass destruction.
author: John Bolton

quote: None of us had any idea of how successful Downton was going to be. I thought I was signing up for another period drama that had a slightly modern feel. It had a freedom about it because it was coming out of the head of Julian Fellowes. Anything could happen and generally did.
author: Dan Stevens

quote: Civilization is the order and freedom is promoting cultural activity.
author: Will Durant

quote: People should have freedom in their pilgrimages and tours. They should come and visit historical monuments and sites - let's say the sites around Iran - where they can easily engage in wide- scale contacts with others.
author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

quote: None who have always been free can understand the terrible fascinating power of the hope of freedom to those who are not free.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: The greatest blessing of our democracy is freedom. But in the last analysis, our only freedom is the freedom to discipline ourselves.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: Freedom - an occupied space which must be reoccupied every day.
author: John Ralston Saul

quote: Freedom is not just declared it is exercised.
author: Ferdinand Marcos

quote: We do not commonly see in a tax a diminution of freedom, and yet it clearly is one.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: Freedom is the emancipation from the arbitrary rule of other men.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: It is not the simple statement of facts that ushers in freedom; it is the constant repetition of them that has this liberating effect. Tolerance is the result not of enlightenment, but of boredom.
author: Quentin Crisp

quote: After the tragedy, New Yorkers are more united than ever in their vision, as well as in appreciation what living in freedom means - and that if we stand together, we can accomplish anything.
author: George Pataki

quote: I understand the sacrifices American servicemen and women have made to protect freedom and democracy in my country and around the world.
author: Psy

quote: I don't labor over my drawings. I want to get freedom in the line.
author: Ellsworth Kelly

quote: The freedom of all is essential to my freedom.
author: Mikhail Bakunin

quote: Spirit borrows from matter the perceptions on which it feeds and restores them to matter in the form of movements which it has stamped with its own freedom.
author: Henri Bergson

quote: It's all very well for us to sit here in the West with our high incomes and cushy lives, and say it's immoral to violate the sovereignty of another state. But if the effect of that is to bring people in that country economic and political freedom, to raise their standard of living, to increase their life expectancy, then don't rule it out.
author: Niall Ferguson

quote: Many people don't understand how disciplined you have to be to play jazz... And that is really the idea of democracy - freedom within the Constitution or discipline. You don't just get out there and do anything you want.
author: Dave Brubeck

quote: Jazz is about freedom within discipline. Usually a dictatorship like in Russia and Germany will prevent jazz from being played because it just seemed to represent freedom, democracy and the United States.
author: Dave Brubeck

quote: So sometimes the facts are good and sometimes the facts are bad, the important thing from the point of view of a principle as broad and important as freedom of speech is that the courts articulate and set forth in a very protective way what those principles are.
author: Floyd Abrams

quote: Women are not stupid, but they were not clever enough to realise that feminism did not bring freedom, but the opposite. That's why I'm glad feminism is dead.
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: From the U.S. Capitol Building to the White House, our national symbols that represent freedom to so many of us, were built by people who were anything but free.
author: Gary Ackerman

quote: Freedom in a commons brings ruin to all.
author: Garrett Hardin

quote: Free men are the strongest men.
author: Wendell Willkie

quote: A culture without property, or in which creators can't get paid, is anarchy, not freedom.
author: Lawrence Lessig

quote: Unlike other enduring characters such as 'Sherlock Holmes' or 'Tarzan,' being the 'Doctor' allows you a certain freedom that is both very demanding and very thrilling. It allows you to make the character using elements of yourself.
author: David Tennant

quote: Freedom of the press is not an end in itself but a means to the end of achieving a free society.
author: Felix Frankfurter

quote: Every man must have the right fearlessly to think independently and express his opinion about what he knows, what he has personally thought about and experienced, and not merely to express with slightly different variations the opinion which has been inculcated in him.
author: Mstislav Rostropovich

quote: Bastard Freedom waves Her fustian flag in mockery over slaves.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: Freedom is contagious. That's why despots fear it so much.
author: Bill Owens

quote: We should favor innovation and freedom over regulation.
author: George Allen

quote: Our forefathers got it; they got it, man. They took godly principles and they put them into action, and they developed our Constitution - the land of freedom where each man is accountable and responsible for his actions.
author: Luke Scott

quote: Freedom under law is hard work. If rulers cannot be trusted with arbitrary power, it is up to citizens to raise their voices at injustice.
author: Anthony Lewis

quote: There's something contagious about demanding freedom.
author: Robin Morgan

quote: Albanians are a nation of freedom fighters who know something about living under oppression.
author: Fatos Nano

quote: Freedom is the right to one's dignity as a man.
author: Archibald MacLeish

quote: Human beings crave freedom at their core.
author: John Ensign

quote: There are two freedoms - the false, where a man is free to do what he likes; the true, where he is free to do what he ought.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: I hear music that comes out of need, out of grief, sorrow, suffering and out of overcoming these things, as well. That journey to freedom still goes on today. It's an incremental change, the culmination of many events in your own life and the lives of your children and grandchildren.
author: Kathleen Battle

quote: Free speech carries with it some freedom to listen.
author: Warren E. Burger

quote: The rewards of freedom are always sweet, but its demands are stern, for at its heart is the paradox that the greatest enemy of freedom is freedom.
author: Os Guinness

quote: What does it mean to be an American? While each of us may have our own specific answer to that question, we likely can agree on the basic principles of America: freedom, equal opportunity, and rights accompanied by responsibilities.
author: Ben Nelson

quote: The proletariat uses the State not in the interests of freedom but in order to hold down its adversaries, and as soon as it becomes possible to speak of freedom the State as such ceases to exist.
author: Friedrich Engels

quote: When you become a sannyasin, I initiate you into freedom, and into nothing else... I am destroying your ideologies, creeds, cults, dogmas, and I am not replacing them with anything else.
author: Rajneesh

quote: The case for freedom, the case for our constitutional principles the case for our heritage has to be made anew in each generation. The work of freedom is never done.
author: Anthony Kennedy

quote: Freedom is never easily won, but once established, freedom lasts, spreads and chokes out tyranny.
author: Trent Lott

quote: Some of the press who speak loudly about the freedom of the press are themselves the enemies of freedom. Countless people dare not say a thing because they know it will be picked up and made a song of by the press. That limits freedom.
author: Geoffrey Fisher

quote: Ruby inherited the Perl philosophy of having more than one way to do the same thing. I inherited that philosophy from Larry Wall, who is my hero actually. I want to make Ruby users free. I want to give them the freedom to choose.
author: Yukihiro Matsumoto

quote: The range of choice open to the individual is not the decisive factor in determining the degree of human freedom, but what can be chosen and what is chosen by the individual.
author: Herbert Marcuse

quote: The link between my experience as an entrepreneur and that of a politician is all in one word: freedom.
author: Silvio Berlusconi

quote: The price of freedom is eternal vigilance. Don't store unnecessary data, keep an eye on what's happening, and don't take unnecessary risks.
author: Chris Bell

quote: And I have been able to give freedom and life which was acknowledged in the ecstasy of walking hand in hand across the most beautiful bridge of the world, the cables enclosing us and pulling us upward in such a dance as I have never walked and never can walk with another.
author: Hart Crane

quote: Brothers in suffering, brothers in resistance, brothers in ideals and conviction. It is now our duty to further strengthen this bond in order to secure this hard-won freedom for future generations.
author: Guy Verhofstadt

quote: A state that suppresses all freedom of speech, and which by imposing the most terrible punishments, treats each and every attempt at criticism, however morally justified, and every suggestion for improvement as plotting to high treason, is a state that breaks an unwritten law.
author: Kurt Huber

quote: I came out of the Soviet Union no longer a communist, because I believed in personal freedom.
author: Rose Wilder Lane

quote: I didn't come to Washington to fight against my Republican colleagues, or even against my colleagues on the other side of the aisle. I came to Washington to fight for the values that make our country unique - for the economic freedom that gives life to the American Dream.
author: David Schweikert

quote: They were singing in French, but the melody was freedom and any American could understand that.
author: Audie Murphy

quote: Freedom is an internal achievement rather than an external adjustment.
author: Powell Clayton

quote: Being in Loyola College exposed me to other options and gave me confidence, apart from the freedom to bunk classes. I became a merchandiser and then a garment manufacturer, and interacting with foreign buyers and manufacturing foreign brands in India gave me a high.
author: Suriya

quote: Pursuing your passion is fulfilling and leads to financial freedom.
author: Robert G. Allen

quote: The most important influence in my childhood was my father.
author: DeForest Kelley

quote: I love my dad, and I'm proud to be his daughter.
author: Paris Jackson

quote: My dad's the one who's always been there; he's my hero, you could say. Even when he was working, he'd do anything for me. He's been the biggest influence in my life.
author: Gareth Bale

quote: I think the most fun part about working on 'Good Luck Charlie' is spending time with everyone, honestly, because everybody on set is like my brother and sister and mom and dad. They're so fun to be around, so that's probably the best part about working there.
author: Bradley Steven Perry

quote: My dad always said, 'Champ, the measure of a man is not how often he is knocked down, but how quickly he gets up.'
author: Joe Biden
category: Man, Measure Of A Man, Down

quote: My Father had a profound influence on me. He was a lunatic.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: Dad is and always will be my living, breathing superhero.
author: Bindi Irwin

quote: After my parents' divorce when I was 4, I spent weekends with my dad before we finally moved to California. By the time Sunday rolled around, I was incapable of enjoying the day's activities, of being in the moment, because I was already dreading the inevitable goodbye of Sunday evening.
author: Rob Lowe

quote: Everything I do in my life I do to make my mum and dad proud. I want to carry on in my dad's footsteps and make sure that his legacy lives on forever.
author: Bindi Irwin

quote: My dad, Frank Addison Albini, was a terrific shot with a rifle and had generally excellent hunting skills. While my dad loved hunting and fishing, he didn't romanticize them. He was filling the freezer, not intellectualizing some caveman impulse or proving his worth as a real man.
author: Steve Albini

quote: I inherited that calm from my father, who was a farmer. You sow, you wait for good or bad weather, you harvest, but working is something you always need to do.
author: Miguel Indurain

quote: Dad was a baker, and we lived above the bakery, so I was always popping down to have an apple pie or a doughnut or a custard or gypsy tart: I had a very sweet tooth, and I think that that was what got me into doing what I do now.
author: Paul Hollywood

quote: My father? I never knew him. Never even seen a picture of him.
author: Eminem

quote: Nowadays, if you have a mustache, people look at you like you're crazy. But when I was growing up, I never saw my dad without a mustache.
author: Kevin Connolly

quote: My father taught me that the only way you can make good at anything is to practice, and then practice some more.
author: Pete Rose

quote: You know, my mother's beautiful, my dad was a really handsome man, and there was a lot of talk about looks when I was growing up.
author: Courteney Cox

quote: I think there's nothing better than laughing in life, so that's nice, to be thought of as someone who can make someone laugh. It's 'cause I think life is hard. You know, my dad was a really silly man. A great Irish silly man. And that's fine.
author: Joan Cusack

quote: My mother told me, 'Always do your best,' and my dad says, 'It's important to be humble. That's the key. They're not there for you. You're there for them.'
author: Luke Benward

quote: I grew up watching my dad scout games live. They played on Saturday. Sometimes they wouldn't get the films until Monday. Sunday air shipping from wherever the college team was located - Starkville, Mississippi, or wherever the film was coming from. It took two days.
author: Bill Belichick

quote: It is easier for a father to have children than for children to have a real father.
author: Pope John XXIII

quote: I just wish I could understand my father.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: If my father had hugged me even once, I'd be an accountant right now.
author: Ray Romano

quote: But my dad also was a remarkable man, a good person, a principled individual, a man of integrity.
author: Sidney Poitier

quote: I like to keep most of my bats. I think I have about 250 bats, including my first - which cost Rs 2000 - a gift from my dad in 1998, when I moved to the hostel.
author: Suresh Raina

quote: Everyone talks about how we're on our phones all the time, but the fact remains that when I'm away on a film set for two months, I can Skype my family. I remember the phone calls my parents had to make when my dad was away for a while when I was younger - that once-a-week expensive phone call! The time pressure on talking to your father!
author: Domhnall Gleeson

quote: I actually hated hunting the first time I went when I was a kid. My dad took us deer hunting. We sat there for 30 minutes, and I felt like I was losing my mind. But in college, I fell in love with it. Football became a full-time job, and I needed an escape. I needed something that would mellow me out.
author: Carson Wentz

quote: Mental illness can happen to anybody. You can be a dustman, a politician, a Tesco worker... anyone. It could be your dad, your brother or your aunt.
author: Frank Bruno

quote: I never had a speech from my father 'this is what you must do or shouldn't do' but I just learned to be led by example. My father wasn't perfect.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: My dad taught me from my youngest childhood memories through these connections with Aboriginal and tribal people that you must always protect people's sacred status, regardless of the past.
author: Steve Irwin

quote: Simple. Pared down. Timeless. The ties were never too thick or too thin; the pants were never too flared or too skinny. In my life with Dad, he wore Western apparel because we went riding - jeans, cowboy boots, the turquoise belt buckle. But it was all very simple, and that classic look is very 'Ralph Lauren.'
author: Jennifer Grant

quote: The lesson of Pearl Harbor ought never to be forgotten, and of course the motto that came from that, 69 years ago, the war which my dad fought, was 'Remember Pearl Harbor, never again.' We need to keep that to mind.
author: Oliver North

quote: Most parents were, like, Little League coaches and all that. My dad was a wrestling fan. Instead of going out and playing home run derby with my old man, we just watched wrestling together.
author: John Cena

quote: As Daddy said, life is 95 percent anticipation.
author: Gloria Swanson

quote: Undeservedly you will atone for the sins of your fathers.
author: Horace

quote: Fathers are biological necessities, but social accidents.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: I know that I will never find my father in any other man who comes into my life, because it is a void in my life that can only be filled by him.
author: Halle Berry

quote: My grandfather, along with Carnegie, was a pioneer in philanthropy, which my father then practiced on a very large scale.
author: David Rockefeller

quote: I pressed my father's hand and told him I would protect his grave with my life. My father smiled and passed away to the spirit land.
author: Chief Joseph

quote: Being a father, being a friend, those are the things that make me feel successful.
author: William Hurt

quote: A working definition of fathering might be this: fathering is the act of guiding a child to behave in ways that lead to the child's becoming a secure child in full, thus increasing his or her chances of being happy and fruitful as a young adult.
author: Clyde Edgerton

quote: You can tell your uncle stuff that you could not tell your dad. That is kind of the role of an uncle. I feel very much like a father sometimes but sometimes I feel like a teammate.
author: Dusty Baker

quote: There are many people who are behind whatever I've achieved so far. My dad, Daboo Malik, is my mentor and guiding light who supported and influenced me. Without him, I wouldn't have been able to be what I am today. Besides him, Salman Khan is yet another important person who is my biggest and constant inspiration.
author: Armaan Malik

quote: I was born in Orange County - in Santa Ana. My dad is from California. I was raised on the East Coast. My first two years were in California, but I claim East Coast. I'm sorry, I don't rep California.
author: Michael B. Jordan

quote: I'm from Santa Cruz in Northern California, and the 49ers were my dad and I's bonding time.
author: Marisa Miller

quote: My dad is a writer, and to see him always in front of a typewriter gave me the inspiration to write. He was my idol, my hero. I wanted to be just like him.
author: Shakira

quote: My dad used to say, 'You wouldn't worry so much about what people thought about you if you knew how seldom they did.
author: Phil McGraw

quote: As a brother and sister, our tastes were pretty different growing up. He liked a lot of early hip hop. My dad didn't understand it and would try to talk him out of it.
author: Taryn Manning

quote: I've got high standards when it comes to boys. As my dad says, all girls should! I'm from the South - Tennessee, to be exact - and down there, we're all about southern hospitality. I know that if I like a guy, he better be nice, and above all, my dad has to approve of him!
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: Within our culture, every school has a swimming pool. We lived on the coast. People swam in the surf. It's a very sporty nation and at that particular time anyone who had an artistic bent was very much an outsider. So if you liked reading or ideas or playing the piano then your dad viewed you as a sissy, basically.
author: Geoffrey Rush

quote: We all have experiences in our lives that change us, and we all learn from people, like my dad, but at the end of the day, it's only us. And we're only responsible to make ourselves happy.
author: Tom Brady

quote: I like to believe that I've got a lot of guardian warriors sittin' on my shoulder including my dad.
author: Patrick Swayze

quote: My dad became a soap opera actor, and I was an extra in a skating rink scene on the soap. I didn't audition. It was nepotism all the way.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: My dad's method in his madness was to try every sport and then observe what I liked. I played football, tennis, golf, cricket but I loved my snooker.
author: Ronnie O'Sullivan

quote: As a teenager, I developed a great interest in not only horse breeding but also horse racing and used to bet based on red-hot tips. I realized that becoming a bookmaker would be very lucrative, but Dad put his foot down, saying it was an inappropriate career.
author: Cyrus S. Poonawalla

quote: Growing up in Georgia, my dad was a farmer and we worked in agriculture, so we were always looking up at the sky, checking if rain was in the forecast. That always set the tone for the mood in my household, whether we had rain coming in or not - we knew the crops would be good and it was going to be a good week around the Bryan household.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: My dad was in the military. It was difficult sometimes, because he would have to be away a lot, and we would have to move around a lot. Trying to adapt to new schools and new places can be really tough.
author: Nolan Gould

quote: My dad was very intelligent, had a very strong personality. I was amazed with my father.
author: Dolores Huerta

quote: My dad only ever talked about two things: bicycles and Mercedes.
author: Raf Simons

quote: I hate short hair on men - the 'real' man is something I don't know. My dad was always playing with hairbands, making rings, while the women were wearing jeans, white T-shirts and Converse. That was the uniform at home.
author: Lou Doillon

quote: My dad being a salesman taught me you can sell anybody anything if you've got the ability to believe.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: When I was growing up, my parents were almost involved in various volunteer things. My dad was head of Planned Parenthood. And it was very controversial to be involved with that.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Atticus Finch. That's who I want to be when I grow up. He's the greatest guy ever - a good dad, a good lawyer, doing the right thing. And he knows he's not supposed to win, but he's doing it anyway.
author: Sean Patrick Maloney

quote: I think, if I had a dad, I would have went the normal college route. I'm so stoked my life panned out how it was.
author: Tyler, The Creator

quote: My dad never missed a day of work, and he was always smiling when he came home.
author: Patty Loveless

quote: I'm so excited to be carrying on in Dad's footsteps and making sure that everything he worked so hard for continues for the generations to come.
author: Bindi Irwin

quote: I wanted to be a police officer for a long time so I could be just like my dad!
author: Doreen Cronin

quote: Taylor was named after James Taylor and claims that she knows all the James Taylor songs, and I'm a huge fan of James Taylor and know all his songs, too. My dad told me that if I ever met Taylor Swift, I had to tell her that I know every James Taylor song. We started naming albums, and we were both shouting them out.
author: Charlie Puth

quote: I know my dad always wanted to heal the world, and so I think it would be great to follow in his footsteps.
author: Paris Jackson

quote: I was an all-sport athlete growing up. My dad, I think, hoped I would go to college on a scholarship.
author: T. J. Perkins

quote: I didn't come from a wealthy family. My dad told us if we wanted spending money, we had to earn it. So I developed an early work ethic.
author: Johnny Iuzzini

quote: I'm compared to my dad all the time, and I've learned to take it positively by working hard.
author: Ram Charan

quote: I can remember 1987 when I had my first amateur fight in Michigan, weighing 64lb. I was 10 years old. I was the youngest and smallest guy on my team. I can remember what I ate. There was this restaurant called Ponderosa, and my dad made me eat a steak. I was happy. It was a first round knockout. I slept with my trophy for two weeks.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: My father was a tomato farmer. There is the phrase that says he or she worked their fingers to the bone, well, that's my dad. And he was a very good man.
author: Sidney Poitier

quote: Because of his military service, Dad was buried in Arlington National Cemetery.
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: My dad knows how to tell a story. He'd make me laugh by doing all the different voices.
author: Lily Collins

quote: My dad is a Chatty Cathy, the social butterfly; friendly; knows everybody in the whole world by six degrees; tells me that every performance is the greatest he's ever seen, every new outfit is the coolest. Constant cheerleader.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: My dad taught me never to be afraid of what's on the other side of the mountain.
author: Natalie Massenet

quote: Joanna points her camera at a section of society unused to having cameras pointed at it. But I don't know about categorizing them in terms of class I'm a bit wary of that. My dad is the son of a shipbuilder.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: I want to be a young dad. By 25 or 26 I want to see myself, like, married or start looking for a family.
author: Justin Bieber

quote: My dad is very successful in his business. He's always been big in having hobbies and having little ways to get away. He always made time for hunting and fishing. He always encouraged me to do it.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: When you're growing up, your dad is your superhero. Once you've let yourself fall that in love with someone, once you put him on such a high pedestal and he lets you down, you never want to experience that pain again.
author: Jay-Z

quote: My dad once said that in criminal law you see terrible people on their best behavior in family law you see great people on their worst behavior.
author: Laura Wasser

quote: My brothers always like to believe that my father pampered me and I am spoilt. While it is not true, they felt that way. As for my dad, I could not do anything wrong. So, if I did something wrong, I would put the blame on them, and he would shout at them.
author: Sonakshi Sinha

quote: To be able to have winning in your blood growing up, whether it was pounding my little brother or trying to beat my dad in something, or just competing on teams with my friends, it was nonstop.
author: Jordan Spieth

quote: I was a pitcher, and my dad played in college. The hardest day of my life was telling him I was going to quit to focus more on golf. But with golf, I felt like the game can't be perfected, and that motivated me.
author: Jordan Spieth

quote: My dad actually makes the best cookies. My mum is great baker, too, but doesn't share them - it's tantalising! Luckily for me though, my dad shares his!
author: Blake Lively

quote: With Dad, he was the ultimate wildlife warrior, and we admired him more than anything.
author: Bindi Irwin

quote: I am a product of nepotism. I don't think I would have had the profession that I'm in currently... if it wasn't for my dad.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: Boxing's in my genes. I come from a fighting background. My dad and both my uncles were good boxers. I'm blessed with the art of war.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: My story starts with my dad, a black boy born to a single mother in a small town in North Carolina. It starts with my parents meeting in Washington, D.C., in the '60s, at a time of incredible activism.
author: Cory Booker

quote: Growing up, I was discouraged from telling personal stories. My dad often used the phrase 'Don't tell anyone.' But not about creepy things. I don't want to lead you down the wrong path. It would be about insignificant things. Like, I wouldn't make the soccer team, and my father would say, 'Don't tell anyone.'
author: Mike Birbiglia

quote: Whenever I fail as a father or husband... a toy and a diamond always works.
author: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: My dad has always been really helpful. He taught me that talent is a bonus, but persistence is what wins out.
author: Zosia Mamet

quote: My dad was the district attorney of New Orleans for about 30 years. And when he opened his campaign headquarters back in the early '70s, when I was 5 years old, my mother wanted me to play the national anthem. And they got an upright piano on the back of a flatbed truck and I played it.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: I got stuck up a tree when I was about seven, and my dad had to come and get the ladder to get me down. I loved to climb all the way up to the top. I must have been a koala in my past life.
author: Miranda Kerr

quote: Principles are the most important thing to me. One of the things I think my dad taught me was there are people who accept the world they live in and there are people who change the world they live in. I don't accept my circumstances.
author: Ken Buck

quote: My youngest son's pre-school class was recently asked what their dads do for work. The responses were things like, my dad sells money, and my dad figures stuff out. My son said, 'I've never seen my dad do work.' It's true. Skateboarding doesn't seem like real work, but I'm proud of what I do.
author: Tony Hawk

quote: The child is father of the man.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: My dad used to say, 'Just be yourself and you'll be fine,' but it's really, really true.
author: Bellamy Young

quote: I started traveling by myself as early as 5 to see my dad. I'd go to Toronto or Los Angeles, depending on what show he was doing, but most often New York, and we would hang out, and he'd take me to museums and Broadway plays. The ones that had the biggest impact on me were the George C. Wolfe productions.
author: Mahershala Ali

quote: I've never heard my dad say a bad word about anybody. He always keeps his emotions in check and is a true gentleman. I was taught that losing it was indulgent, a selfish act.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: My career choice is my career choice. Just stepping out of that zone, to be able to be a provider. I understand my position as a provider and my role as a dad also... Just being able to be comfortable with it.
author: Future

quote: My dad is a motorcycle guy, not some Hollywood dude.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: My dad always taught me never to give up in my mind. You can never really beat me. It sounds ridiculous, but I will always come back for you. You can't beat someone who never gives up. I could lose 100 times to you, but I will always get you. I will die trying. This applies not only to swimming but to my life as well.
author: Chad le Clos

quote: I was always a kid trying to make a buck. I borrowed a dollar from my dad, went to the penny candy store, bought a dollar's worth of candy, set up my booth, and sold candy for five cents apiece. Ate half my inventory, made $2.50, gave my dad back his dollar.
author: Guy Fieri

quote: My first outdoor cooking memories are full of erratic British summers, Dad swearing at a barbecue that he couldn't put together, and eventually eating charred sausages, feeling brilliant.
author: Jamie Oliver

quote: My mum and dad aren't together, but she plays a massive part in my life. We have deep conversations: I tell her where I need support, where I feel she's lacking, and I support her with whatever she needs. I understand she won't be here forever, and I want no regrets.
author: Anthony Joshua

quote: My Dad, a small-town lawyer, was also named Paul. Until we lost him when I was 16, he was a gentle presence in my life. I like to think he'd be proud of me and my sister and brothers, because I'm sure proud of him and of where I come from, Janesville, Wisconsin.
author: Paul Ryan

quote: I didn't have any role models really. My best friend was a dog. My mum and dad saved a dog from the gutter and that dog was my brother before Jesse was born. Sami was his name and he was my role model.
author: Ville Valo

quote: Some of the happiest times I ever saw my dad was times when I was with him in the casinos, and he had a good night.
author: James Packer

quote: One of the things my dad and I got to bond over was going to the San Antonio Spurs games when Gervin was there, James Silas... I can't remember the rest of the guys' names, but it was a fun time.
author: Shawn Michaels

quote: As a father now, I wouldn't do what my dad did, because it left me feeling emotionally unstable as a kid. But he didn't do the things he did out of selfishness or malice.
author: Anthony Kiedis

quote: I want to stay healthy, keep fit, eat well, keep a low profile and be a good dad.
author: Frank Bruno

quote: One time, on Marine One, the president asked me my opinion. I had a flashback to being at the kitchen table with my dad. That dominant male figure set me up for being confident to express myself with precision and persuasion.
author: Dana Perino

quote: I do remember vividly sometime after puberty when I'd answer the phone at home and the callers began to say, 'Hi, Bill!' That's when I knew Dad and I had the same voice.
author: Willie Geist

quote: The biggest lesson I learned from my dad is to support children even if they're doing something that is unorthodox.
author: Tony Hawk

quote: The worst advice I ever received from my dad was to play by the book.
author: Dimebag Darrell

quote: Humans have voids, and you need things to fill voids... I didn't have a dad to fill that male model void, so when I heard Eminem or freaking seen Dave Chapelle, that's what I gravitated to.
author: Tyler, The Creator

quote: My dad grew up in Banbridge, Northern Ireland, desperate to get to London. I grew up in London, so I don't know what it's like to yearn for the big city from a small town.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: Sons have always a rebellious wish to be disillusioned by that which charmed their fathers.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: I stopped loving my father a long time ago. What remained was the slavery to a pattern.
author: Anais Nin

quote: I am lucky to have had an attentive, curious and loving dad and heart-smart, down-to-earth, gifted mother. They changed the outlooks of their own lives and have never forgotten the people and organizations that helped them dream bigger than their circumstances should have allowed.
author: Jennifer Garner

quote: My dad liked to boil a squirrel head and suck the brains out the nose. Smaller than a chicken, bigger than a rat.
author: Beth Ditto

quote: Ah, my dad's whistle. On holidays when I was a kid, we would all be off in the rock pools along the beach. When it came time to go, we'd hear the whistle and we'd all come running. Like dogs!
author: Kate Winslet

quote: I will always do what I can to help others, but when I retire, I want to be a dad and a husband. I want a house and a dog in the yard. I want to have barbecues.
author: J. J. Watt

quote: I didn't know my dad for a long time. My dad was on drugs and my dad was at the VA Hospital, my dad was off in his own world selling drugs or using them or there would be crack heads in the house or whatever it would be.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: I have to remind my dad, 'Journalists - no matter how many cigars they smoke with you - are not your friends, so don't talk to them.'
author: Cameron Diaz

quote: My dad said to me growing up: 'When all is said and done, if you can count all your true friends on one hand, you're a lucky man.'
author: Josh Charles

quote: I was into the Mets because my Dad worked at IBM where he got free Mets tickets, so I was into the Mets... then I got to 'Saturday Night Live' where my boss has unbelievable N.Y. Yankees tickets, so he invites us to the games. I'm going to all the games, so I might as well root for the team I'm gonna go sit with.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: My dad had an aunt at the turn of the century who died from diabetes, but she was the closest affected relative in my family.
author: Bobby Clarke

quote: My mum was very conscious about fashion, and my dad was born into the tailoring tradition, so fashion has always been my life, although now, really, I wear the same thing - just in different weights - light and heavy cashmere in winter and cotton in summer. And jeans.
author: Domenico Dolce

quote: I always joke that my kids' favorite holiday is Father's Day. They love the way I celebrate the occasion by writing each of them a thank-you letter and a generous check. It's my way of letting them know how much I appreciate the great pleasure and privilege of being their dad.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: My family always helped me. I had people around me who always pushed me to be the best: my dad, my mum. My dad used to play and coach as well. But I wasn't born with shiny things.
author: Paul Pogba

quote: My dad has been a big influence on me, because he's always had his own business. He really taught me business sense and how to be a focused individual, but also how to have fun and make everyone around you have fun.
author: Wiz Khalifa

quote: On rare occasions, Dad used to reminisce about when he met Eisenhower and how Churchill would pop in, in the late hours of the evening or night, carrying a cigar, when he'd obviously had a good dinner.
author: Ridley Scott

quote: There's sometimes a weird benefit to having an alcoholic, violent father. He really motivated me in that I never wanted to be anything like him.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: A father is always making his baby into a little woman. And when she is a woman he turns her back again.
author: Enid Bagnold

quote: I have never been a material girl. My father always told me never to love anything that cannot love you back.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: My father wants me to be like my brother, but I can't be.
author: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: Babies don't need fathers, but mothers do. Someone who is taking care of a baby needs to be taken care of.
author: Amy Heckerling

quote: I kept my babies fed. I could have dumped them, but I didn't. I decided that whatever trip I was on, they were going with me. You're looking at a real daddy.
author: Barry White

quote: I was punished for blowing the whistle on my father's lifestyle.
author: Tatum O'Neal

quote: When I was 18, I thought my father was pretty dumb. After a while when I got to be 21, I was amazed to find out how much he'd learned in three years.
author: Frank Butler

quote: Since I was a boy, from this house, I was out rescuing crocodiles and snakes. My mum and dad were very passionate about that and, I was lucky enough to go along.
author: Steve Irwin

quote: Tiffany is very proud to have the last name and she's proud of her dad.
author: Marla Maples

quote: You know not having my real dad around and having a step dad made me want to be a great dad. So now I have been one for 9 years. And now 3 daughters. So, that is what I am - a dad, first and foremost, before anything else. It's just something that comes natural now.
author: Tim McGraw

quote: I never saw any of my dad's stories. My mother said he had piles and piles of manuscripts.
author: Stephen King

quote: My dad saw my husband's boss at a conference, and he said to stop paying my husband until we produce children.
author: Jenna Bush

quote: I said, 'Ooh, Dad, I want the yellow ones.' He said, 'Where?' I said, 'Right there, Dad. I want the yellow ones.' Everybody goes, 'Those are green'. That's how I knew I was colorblind.
author: Michael Rosenbaum

quote: My dad never told me that when you audition, you might not get the role. He wanted to wait until my first disappointment to tell me.
author: Haley Joel Osment

quote: I would have to say the person with whom I am most in love is definitely my son, Everly Bear. Although I'm his dad, I'm also his friend.
author: Anthony Kiedis

quote: My mother wanted to name me Jackie or Jacqueline but she got to name my sister and my brother, so my dad and my brother insisted on naming me. And they were big fans of 'The Little Mermaid.'
author: Ariel Winter

quote: My dad's a scratch golfer and I've got the knack of seeing something and then replicating it. I saw my dad swing a club and I worked out how to do the same thing. My backswing and follow-through have been basically the same since I was two.
author: Rory McIlroy

quote: Now I meditate twice a day for half an hour. In meditation, I can let go of everything. I'm not Hugh Jackman. I'm not a dad. I'm not a husband. I'm just dipping into that powerful source that creates everything. I take a little bath in it.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: If anybody had a reason to become a delinquent, to become a criminal, to be angry at the man, to be angry at the white man, to be angry at America, it's my dad, but he did not feel that way at all.
author: Larry Elder

quote: During the Depression, my dad made radios to sell to make extra money. Nobody had any money to buy the radios, so he would trade them for dogs. He built kennels in the backyard, and he cared for the dogs.
author: Betty White

quote: My mum was raised Jewish, my dad is very scientifically minded, and my school was vaguely Christian. We sang hymns in school. I liked the hymns bit, but apart from that, I can take it or leave it. So I had lots of different influences when I was younger.
author: Ben Barnes

quote: Paul McCartney had a baby when he was 61; Rod Stewart was 66; Rupert Murdoch was a stunning 72. Not only does that mean they'll have less stamina than the average dad, that means they'll, well, check out a lot sooner too.
author: Jeffrey Kluger

quote: My mother played the piano and my father the violin, I can remember my dad teaching me how to waltz; I had my feet on his, my mother playing the piano, and my husband will tell you the lessons weren't very successful.
author: Quentin Bryce

quote: You draw the best things from your parents and family. You're going to pick up some of the bad things as well - there's a temper that runs through my dad's side of the family that I'm not especially keen on picking up a giant block of.
author: Mark Ronson

quote: My dad's quite a conservative person, and he brought me up to be very questioning of the commercial world. He looked down on pop culture. I definitely got the impression that pop was evil and that Britney Spears was evil.
author: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: My mum and dad have always enjoyed life, and it's something that's been instilled in me. I wake up in a good mood most mornings.
author: Rafe Spall

quote: My mother was a very wonderful woman. When she and my dad divorced, she moved to California and worked two jobs in the cannery at night and as a waitress during the day. But she saved enough money to establish a restaurant.
author: Dolores Huerta

quote: One of my dad's friends from the music industry came over to our house one time and heard me sing, and he said, 'She should audition for this role I have!' So I did! It was a movie called 'The Gospel,' which I did when I was five. That was when I was like, 'I want to do this acting thing!'
author: China Anne McClain

quote: My dad was an assembly line worker at AC Spark Plug, which was a division of General Motors, and his job was to build and then inspect the little spark plugs as they came off the line.
author: Michael Moore

quote: I love my dad; I'm a daddy's girl, all the way.
author: Molly Quinn

quote: God bless Dad, he came to every one of my shows. I was bad, and I had horrible stage fright. My dad was so relieved - he'd say, 'You were terrible; this kid is not going to be an actor.' Finally, I did a play and he said, 'Son - you were really good.'
author: Kirk Douglas

quote: I remember my dad asking me one time, and it's something that has always stuck with me: 'Why not you, Russ?' You know, why not me? Why not me in the Super Bowl?
author: Russell Wilson

quote: I used to play chess when I was a kid and participate in national-level tournaments with the geekiest guys. This one time, I was losing terribly, so I batted my eyelashes and flirted as I asked for a draw. My dad just couldn't believe it. He thought, 'What have I created, a floozy?' But it worked!
author: Jordana Spiro

quote: My dad's cooking was magic in the kitchen. But eventually over the years, his personality changed and his ability to remember recipes failed. He became paranoid and thought people were stealing from him, when often he was just misplacing things.
author: Tess Gerritsen

quote: Because my dad's Chinese-American, and they're very concrete, he said, 'There's no money to be made in literature.' So he told me to go into the sciences. And I was a good girl. And I did what Daddy said. And that's how I ended up being a doctor. But you know, you just can't stamp out that desire to tell stories.
author: Tess Gerritsen

quote: I recall my dad saying about me once that the only time he'd ever heard me say 'never' was when I was asked if I'd had enough.
author: Bob Diamond

quote: My dad always taught me to never be satisfied: to want more and know that what is done is done. That was his way of seeing the game. You've done it, now move on. People might say, 'Well, when can you enjoy it?' But it worked for me because, in the game, you need to be on your toes.
author: Thierry Henry

quote: I was obsessed with clowns. My dad had to get rid of them. I thought there were clowns under my bed for years.
author: Haley Bennett

quote: I had one of the most outdoorsy childhoods you could imagine. I basically lived in the woods until I was 13. My dad and I built a huge treehouse in our backyard in Chesterfield, about 30 feet in the air. And we'd vacation on an island in Michigan, where I hunted a deer that we ate.
author: Gabriel Basso

quote: Wear what you want to wear. Do what you want to do. Be who you are. Pick out your own clothes. Be a man. And if that's too much to ask, as it almost always is for me, think of someone you consider to be a man and pretend to be like him. I pretend to be like my dad.
author: Lyle Lovett

quote: I've seen fathers criticizing their sons the moment a game's over. Not my dad. It doesn't matter if I threw an interception or a Hail Mary, he always says, 'Good job, son, I'm proud of you.' Then he shakes my hand and gives me a hug. Every time.
author: Ben Roethlisberger

quote: My dad set a clear model for me for what manhood was all about.
author: Cory Booker

quote: M dad was a boxer, so he had this fierce, physical presence.
author: Anthony Browne

quote: I learned from my dad that change and experimentation are constants and important. You have to keep trying new things.
author: S. Robson Walton

quote: I was looking for the meaning of life when I was in college. And my deal with my dad was as long as I was taking a full course load, then he would pay. And the times that I wasn't taking a full course load, then I was off the dole and I was working.
author: John Mackey

quote: I've got the best parents you could ever ask for. My parents are from New Jersey, and they met in Vermont in college. My Dad grew up listening to heavy, psychedelic music. He's my biggest fan.
author: King Tuff

quote: Every year, I give my dad an advance copy of my latest book. He reads it over the next several nights and says something incredibly supportive. Then he clears his throat nervously and changes the subject.
author: Chelsea Cain

quote: I promised my dad before he passed away that I would take care of the family.
author: Luis Coronel

quote: One day we were sitting in our little classroom in the middle of Australia Zoo, and Dad bursts in and says, 'OK, today we're going to go climb a mountain,' - the Glass House Mountains are about 20 minutes away - so we packed up all our math work and ran out the door and climbed Mount Tibrogargan.
author: Bindi Irwin

quote: There isn't a dude outside my dad who had greater influence on my life.
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

quote: Had my dad not been short and fat and balding, there's no doubt his career would have been very different. But he could do lots of stuff and made a very good career out of it. He had an incredible work ethic because he lost his father when he was very young, and the family had to pull together.
author: Rory Kinnear

quote: If my dad was alive, I wouldn't have gone to boarding school, and I wouldn't have had the success I've had.
author: Jason Day

quote: I come from a very, very small town. There were no other actors around. I never met any actors. A lot of those times when I'd be out in the sheds with my dad, I'd step outside, and there's just nothing out there but thousands of acres, forty thousand sheep, and miles of nothing. And so my mind would just wonder about what else was out there.
author: Jason Clarke

quote: I don't think it ever occurred to me that I wouldn't be an entrepreneur. My dad became a real estate developer, and that work is usually project-based. You attract investors for a project with a certain life cycle, and then you move on to the next thing. It's almost like being a serial entrepreneur, so I had that as an example.
author: Stewart Butterfield

quote: I do have an occasional temper - I sort of inherited my dad's short fuse.
author: Princess Eugenie of York

quote: I never grew up on Jodeci. I never grew up on things like that 'cause my dad was a preacher, and he kind of kept us away from music like that.
author: Tory Lanez

quote: I'm definitely the super-cool dad.
author: Ty Dolla Sign

quote: When you're younger, you're trying to understand and make sense of what your parents are trying to instill in you, which is ultimately life experience. I remember being 17 and my dad trying to teach me the importance of responsibility.
author: Jovan Adepo

quote: I went through a brief phase when I thought of other career options: being an air hostess and even a psychologist. But eventually, my destiny led me to acting. Moreover, my dad being an actor, I have grown up in a very filmi environment. I was encouraged to watch films since I was a child.
author: Shraddha Kapoor

quote: I've got a love affair with Harley-Davidson. One of my earliest photos with my dad is of him holding me as a baby on his bike.
author: Jeffrey Dean Morgan

quote: At my house, it's an, 'If dad says it, you can say it' kind of deal, so a lot of my slang words come off very childish at this point in my career.
author: A.J. Styles

quote: I have carried the burden of my dad's image since day one. They never see me as just another guy trying to make his career in the film industry. I am always 'Megastar' Chiranjeevi's son first, and Ram Charan only later.
author: Ram Charan

quote: My dad was always playing music. Not, like, playing music but listening to music.
author: Post Malone

quote: The most ironic thing is my grandfather has his masters in music composition; he was a jazz composer. My dad was a musician, too. He played more, like, soul music.
author: Travis Scott

quote: I was homeless for about 8 months, I refused to live with my dad or anyone for that matter. So I stayed somewhere that had no hot water, ever, no heat, I told myself I have to be strong and get through it on my own.
author: Eric West

quote: I was built up from my dad more than anyone else.
author: John Wooden

quote: My dad farmed, my granddad was a farmer. I wanted to be a farmer.
author: Sam Brownback

quote: My dad had been shortstop when he was in college, and you know, when you're a kid, you want to be just like your dad.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: My dad would always say, 'What can you do to make the world a better place?' Well, I can make people laugh.
author: Jon Lovitz

quote: My father came from a very poor background, but I was very fortunate in the sense that we were never in need. My dad was determined to make sure that we didn't want for things. He wanted to give us more opportunity than he had, a better shot at a better life.
author: Brad Pitt

quote: I remember when I was younger. Dad's agent came round, and I asked if she would represent me. She didn't represent children at the time, but I wouldn't let her leave the house until she agreed. I've always been quite headstrong.
author: Eleanor Tomlinson

quote: You can't be two people in your brain, one rock dude and a dad - there's something in the middle of them, and that's really what you are and that's going to make you the best dad - not when you try to be one or the other.
author: Gerard Way

quote: Go on daddy-daughter dates and father-and-sons' outings with your children. As a family, go on campouts and picnics, to ball games and recitals, to school programs, and so forth. Having Dad there makes all the difference.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: I was probably a terrible husband, but I pride myself on being a good dad.
author: Dwyane Wade

quote: 'The Simpsons' was about children and married parents; 'Futurama' is about people in between; they're growing up and haven't settled down. Every other cartoon show seemed to be, you know, dumb dad, bratty kids.
author: Matt Groening

quote: My dad was a composer and a musician, but he never finished high school. His formal education was rather minimal from the standards of today's college graduates and Ph.D.'s, but he had a deep interest in questions of science and questions of the universe.
author: Brian Greene

quote: My dad gave me the gene to enjoy cooking, and to enjoy consuming good food and wine.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: I thank my dad for leaving me such a wonderful, wonderful heritage.
author: Natalie Cole

quote: I have a massive Samoan family. And the Samoan culture has always played a massive part of my life. I've got hundreds of family on my dad's side that live in Samoa and in New Zealand. I've just been surrounded by the culture ever since I was a kid.
author: KJ Apa

quote: Dad was an outstanding leader. He'd bring in top thinkers from a wide array of fields - how to fix the Detroit schools, for example. I watched him in these meetings. He listened and probed.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: When my dad founded our church, he used either a globe or a map of the world behind him. It was symbolic of what Christ said: to go forth and preach hope to the world. We believe in the cross, but we just continued with the globe.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: My dad loves what I do and I support my parents financially because they didn't have a job that gave them a pension.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: My dad never graduated high school. He was a printing salesman. We lived in a two-bedroom, one-bath house in St. Louis Park, Minnesota. We weren't rich - but we felt secure.
author: Al Franken

quote: OK, I have a nickname. My family calls me 'Trey' because I'm William the third. My dad has the same name, which is always confusing because my dad is well known, and I'm also known.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Me and my dad are the biggest promoters of an estate tax in the US. It's not a popular position.
author: Bill Gates

quote: People are always coming up to me and saying, 'I heard your dad's speech, and it's really great.' And they'll mention some place I didn't even know my dad was going to.
author: Bill Gates

quote: The only advantage to being a middle-aged man is that when you put on a jacket and tie, you're the Scary Dad. Never mind that no one has had an actually scary dad since 1966. The visceral fear remains.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: My dad had been born in Mexico and his family had to leave during the Mexican revolution.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Because my dad abused me, I was determined to never let a man tell me what to do. God clearly showed me that I needed to be a submissive wife if I wanted to be effective in ministry. The truth is, if we don't learn to submit to authority, we won't ever learn to submit to God.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: My Dad used to tell us: 'En este pais, ustedes van a poder lograr todas las cosas que nosotros no pudimos' 'In this country, you will be able to accomplish all the things we never could.'
author: Marco Rubio

quote: I remember one parent-teacher conference at the lower school, and Barack went, and there were SWAT guys on top of the roof of the school. And Malia was like, 'Dad, really? Really? Do they really have to be up there?' And it's like, yeah, honey, they do.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: My dad was fiscally conservative, and I was influenced by that. He didn't believe in spending more than you had because it gets you into trouble.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: My dad was a big admirer of Sergeant York stories from the First World War.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: Ask anyone on Social Security if their check comes on time every month. Like clockwork. And it comes through the so-called dilapidated U.S. mail. My dad's check literally will come on the same day every month. The government has been quite good and efficient at creating a number of systems.
author: Michael Moore

quote: I wanted to be a skinny little ballerina but I was a voluptuous little Italian girl whose dad had meatballs on the table every night.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: I love my daddy. My daddy's everything. I hope I can find a man that will treat me as good as my dad.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Making your dad happy is - especially for an Italian Catholic girl, I'll tell you - it feels really good.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: I made a decision when my father passed away that I was going to be who God made me to be and not try to preach like my father.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: My dad had a church of 90 people when I was born. It was just, over the years it continued to grow.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I didn't try to copy my dad or fit into the pressure or the mold that everybody tried to make me fit into.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: My dad seemed comfortable with his decision to be a 'have-not,' but I knew that I wasn't.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: In 1997, in Rich Dad, Poor Dad, I stated, 'Your home is not an asset.' Real estate agents sent me hate mail.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: When my book 'Rich Dad's Prophecy' was released in 2002, most financial newspapers and magazines trashed it because I discussed a looming stock market crash.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: My rich dad believed we should all learn to take care of ourselves.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: I think my dad has helped me tremendously.
author: Rand Paul

quote: My dad was one of only four congressmen who supported Reagan.
author: Rand Paul

quote: My dad got a job in a factory in Philadelphia, so I was raised in Germantown in a sort of a barracks for soldiers. They had housing for temporary housing. And then my parents saved money and bought a little house in South Jersey, built on a swamp.
author: Patti Smith

quote: Working with my dad was such a gas. We approached the work in a similar way. We only made two films together when I was an adult, Tucker, and Blown Away, but it was so much fun to play with your parent like that.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: The first thing that pops into my mind when it comes to playing cowboys is my father, Lloyd Bridges. When I was a little kid, I loved to dress up like a cowboy - put on the boots, hat, and walk around. He was in a lot of westerns, and my dad loved to ride.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: My dad was very much a struggling actor and spent more of his life as a postman, as a member of a tarmac firm, as a van driver.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: Mum and Dad were very much friends and up for life. There was no anxiety for anything when I was growing up they just taught me to be me.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: My dad would give me $10, which is a lot of money when you're 9, to sing at church, on tables at restaurants, at family functions, just about anywhere.
author: Katy Perry

quote: My mother is very emotional as well, but my dad is more of the guts of the family. He was the main preacher, so he kind of had this little Pentecostal flair, but they are born-again.
author: Katy Perry

quote: My dad makes food with very few delicate flavours.
author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quote: Dad likes my food, but he probably thinks it's too busy. He is a wonderful cook but only uses three ingredients. My mum rips out my articles and makes my recipes.
author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quote: My dad was never married. He was kind of a rolling stone. But he was never disrespectful. At the same time, even though he had women in his life when I was a kid, there wasn't any consistency.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: My dad came from Cuba when he was a teenager not speaking English. And I grew up here speaking Spanglish. That's the world in which I grew up, and that's a world in which a lot of second generation immigrants find themselves.
author: Ted Cruz

quote: My dad grew up with an avocado tree in his backyard. My entire family, my wife and daughters, they love avocado. I may well be allergic. It makes me physically sick.
author: Ted Cruz

quote: This is going to sound horrible, but I don't even know how much I make in a year. It must be, you know, a couple of million dollars, a few million. I know it's more money than my dad, a jail guard, made in his lifetime; more money than I'll ever need.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: I'm very at ease, and I like it. I never thought I would be such a family-oriented guy; I didn't think that was part of my makeup. But somebody said that as you get older you become the person you always should have been, and I feel that's happening to me. I'm rather surprised at who I am, because I'm actually like my dad!
author: David Bowie

quote: And I saw the sax line-up that he had behind him and I thought, I'm going to learn the saxophone. When I grow up, I'm going to play in his band. So I sort of persuaded my dad to get me a kind of a plastic saxophone on the hire purchase plan.
author: David Bowie

quote: My dad would go to work every day and write in a room full of funny people. He enjoyed it. I know great writers who find the process agonising but to me, writing has always been sheer joy.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: I have a son, but I've never had a daughter. I have a sister, and my sister had a fairly tempestuous relationship with my dad when she was young, and that was gripping and sometimes upsetting.
author: Howard Jacobson

quote: You don't want your children to look at you like you are anything special other than their dad.
author: Martin Freeman

quote: I wasn't like a Fifties dad.
author: Martin Freeman

quote: People are so used to seeing John Goodman as a lovable dad or the quirky characters he played in the Coen Brothers films.
author: James Wan

quote: People are so used to seeing John Goodman as a loveable dad or the quirky characters he played in the Coen Brothers films.
author: James Wan

quote: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is a very small one, particularly if he plays golf.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The fundamental defect of fathers, in our competitive society, is that they want their children to be a credit to them.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: I drove my mum and dad mad.
author: Nicola Sturgeon

quote: My dad's been responsible for a lot of my issues.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: I get that same queasy, nervous, thrilling feeling every time I go to work. That's never worn off since I was 12 years-old with my dad's 8-millimeter movie camera.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: My dad took me to my first movie. It was 'The Greatest Show on Earth' in 1952, a movie of such scale it was actually a traumatic experience.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: I missed my dad a lot growing up, even though we were together as a family. My dad was really a workaholic. And he was always working.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: Dad entered the Second World War like any other man, trying to do the right thing.
author: Ridley Scott

quote: I deal with my sons like young men. If they have a problem with something, they come to me. I am the type of dad that will drop everything I am doing for them, and always tell them to talk to me about it.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: My father was the role model I looked up to. My dad was an entertainer, too. I patterned my life after him. He wanted me to do better than he did. He never sold a record in his life, but to me, he was still a rock star.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: My dad was good with actions.
author: William Shatner

quote: My dad died of a stroke.
author: William Shatner

quote: Attraction doesn't stop when a child is born. It's the opposite. Being a mum and dad makes you even sexier.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: Think about finding out when you're 13 that your dad is not your dad. It's like, okay, take it on the chin and keep going. No choice, really.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: I was in the bath at the time, and my dad came running in and said, 'Guess who they want to play Harry Potter!?' and I started to cry. It was probably the best moment of my life.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: My dad's got a brilliant eye for scripts 'cos he's a literary agent. He and my agent read a load of scripts and filter them.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: When I was 13, I opened my own business called The Awesome Pretzel Company, and my dad helped me build a pretzel cart.
author: Guy Fieri

quote: I think my dad is highly gender-neutral. If he doesn't like someone, he'll articulate that, and I think it's also part of what resonates about him. He'll say what he's thinking.
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: It was my dad's idea to change my name from Sahatciu to Ora. He said it would be easier to pronounce.
author: Rita Ora

quote: My mum and my dad are the sweetest couple.
author: Rita Ora

quote: My dad wanted me to go down a more academic route. He is very much about sticking to the rule book and sticking to the blueprint of a successful career.
author: Rita Ora

quote: I love eating at my dad's pub, the Queens Arms in Kilburn. It does a traditional Albanian spinach pie.
author: Rita Ora

quote: My dad took on every job he could get. He worked like mad. But then, at some point, he had saved up enough to open his first pub.
author: Rita Ora

quote: I've been going to Bicester Village since I was young. My mum and dad really loved that place, and I always used to stock up on clothes. I love the fact that it supports great British designers.
author: Rita Ora

quote: Now my dad is with me, traveling with me and a big part of this whole thing is I like to mix it up a little bit, you know. Who gets to take their father on a private jet across the country and stay in first class hotels? So we're enjoying it, but I'd stop if it's not possible.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: I don't know, I just want to be happy. I could be in a hole somewhere. Or I could completely lose it and be some hippy living in the woods with my dad.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: I'm not great at dealing with death, I have to say. I find death very hard: my mum, my dad, Sid Vicious. I'm not a monster; I feel it and it scares me. One death at a time, please, is all my heart will bear.
author: John Lydon

quote: I truly think comedy is - being funny is DNA. My dad was a doctor, a wonderful doctor, and people still come up to me today, 'Your father helped my mother die.' You know what I'm saying? He made her laugh 'til she died. My father was always very funny.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: I stayed in Baghdad every summer until I was 14. My dad's sister is still there, but many of my relatives have managed to get out. People forget that there are still people there who are not radicalized in any particular direction, trying to live normal lives in a very difficult situation.
author: Andy Serkis

quote: My mother had very humble beginnings - to put it mildly. Her dad built their home out of timber that he cut down on their land. No heat, no air-conditioning - 'no foolishness,' as he would call it.
author: Blake Lively

quote: My dad was an English professor.
author: Blake Lively

quote: Great dad. Yeah, he would ask me for money on birthdays and, you know, inappropriate times. And I just wrote him off like, 'You're not a father.' I just learned you cannot emotionally invest in people who are not attainable.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: I used to do bell ringing in Benenden church. It was really good fun, actually. My best friend's dad was the local vicar, and so it was expected as her best friend that I would go to church every Sunday with her.
author: Jo Brand

quote: My dad's a very sensitive man, but as the archetypal rebellious teenager, I didn't realise that.
author: Jo Brand

quote: My mum is bright, ambitious, well read, political and very bolshie: when my dad was conscripted into the Army and posted to Libya, she convinced some general to let her go with him. I don't know how she managed it.
author: Jo Brand

quote: It wasn't like I was self-motivated. My dad started me. It was his dream before it was mine.
author: Venus Williams

quote: I'm always on the court with my dad.
author: Venus Williams

quote: My dad loves to eat, and he loves everything I make!
author: Venus Williams

quote: My views about God come from my dad. Dad told me that he believed Nature, which to him included humankind, to be so beautiful, so magnificent, that there had to be something behind it all.
author: Al Franken

quote: My parents didn't make a lot of money. My dad was not a high school graduate - he didn't have a career as such he was a printing salesman essentially for most of his working life.
author: Al Franken

quote: My dad loved comedians, especially George Jessel, and he loved Henny Youngman and Buddy Hackett.
author: Al Franken

quote: My dad was a terrible businessman.
author: Al Franken

quote: My dad is an attorney. I've always been interested in it. My sons are probably going to law school.
author: Rob Lowe

quote: A kid is something precious, and you want to protect it and keep it fun. I'm not a dad, but I've seen people and how they behave with their kids.
author: Jason Statham

quote: When I was growing up, my dad didn't have weights, so he made himself a weight bench. Instead of a hand-me-down jacket, it was a hand-me-down weight bench.
author: Jason Statham

quote: The physical DNA has always been part of our family. My dad was a good boxer and gymnast; my mum is a ballroom dancer, and my brother does martial arts.
author: Jason Statham

quote: I remember tap-dancing and singing in front of the TV when I was a kid, telling my dad to stop watching Ed Sullivan or Milton Berle and watch me.
author: Andie MacDowell

quote: In my heart, I'm just a kid from the council houses. I can remember the old cottage and my dad coming round with the tin bath. I'm not a rich man.
author: Terry Pratchett
